Sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya timbarurukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā ‘‘tindukācīra’’nti ca, ekāva nivāsā sālā etthāti ‘‘ekasālako’’ti ca vuccati. ^b^Atthābhisamayā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikassa atthassa hitassa paṭilābhato. ^b^Mānābhisamayā^eb^ti mānappahānā. ^b^Pīḷanaṭṭho^eb^ti pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ, avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ, pīḷanameva attho pīḷanaṭṭho ^a^M1.0040^ea^. ^b^Santāpo^eb^ti dukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ. ^b^Vipariṇāmo^eb^ti jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā ^a^V1.0036^ea^ vipariṇāmetabbatā abhisametabbo paṭivijjhitabboti abhisamayo, sova ^b^abhisamayaṭṭho,^eb^ pīḷanādīni.

Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo uddhaṭo. Tattha saṅgamavasena paccayānaṃ phaluppādanaṃ paṭi ayanaṃ ekato pavatti etthāti samayo, ^b^samavāyo^eb^. Vivaṭṭūpanissayasaṅgame sati enti ettha sattā pavattantīti samayo, ^b^khaṇo^eb^. Sameti ettha saṅkhatadhammo, sayaṃ vā eti āgacchati vigacchati cāti samayo, ^b^kālo^eb^. Samenti avayavā etasmiṃ, sayaṃ vā tesūti samayo, ^b^samūho^eb^. Paccayantarasaṅgame eti āgacchati etasmā phalanti samayo, ^b^hetu^eb^. Saññāvasena vipallāsato dhammesu eti abhinivisatīti samayo, ^b^diṭṭhi^eb^. Samīpaṃ ayanaṃ upagamanaṃ samayo, ^b^paṭilābho^eb^. Sammadeva sahitānaṃ vācānaṃ ayanaṃ vigamoti samayo, ^b^pahānaṃ^eb^. Sammadeva, sahitānaṃ vā saccānaṃ ayanaṃ jānananti samayo, ^b^paṭivedho^eb^. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.

Ettha ca samayasaddassa sāmaññena anekatthatā vuttā. Na hi ekasmiṃ atthavisese vattamāno saddo tadaññepi vattati. Tasmā atthā viya taṃtaṃvācakā samayasaddāpi bhinnā evāti gahetabbā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāresu.

^b^Tattha tathā^eb^ti tesu suttābhidhammesu upayogabhummavacanehi. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti vinaye, ^b^aññathā^eb^ti karaṇavacanena. ^b^Accantamevā^eb^ti nirantarameva. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantarūpalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ yathā udaye sati cande jāto rājaputtoti. ^b^Adhikaraṇañhī^eb^tiādi abhidhamme samayasaddo kālasamūhakhaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātesu pañcasu atthesu vattati, na vinaye viya kāle eva, tesu ca kālasamūhatthā dve tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena niddisituṃ yuttā. Khaṇasamavāyahetuatthā pana tayopi attano bhāvena phassādīnaṃ bhāvassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena ^a^M1.0041^ea^ niddisituṃ yuttāti vibhāvanamukhena yathāvuttamatthaṃ samatthetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmiñhi kāle, dhammasamūhe vā samaye adhikaraṇabhūte kusalaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiññeva kāle, dhammasamūhe vā samaye phassādayo hontīti evaṃ adhikaraṇatthayojanā, yasmiṃ pana khaṇe, samavāye hetumhi vā samaye sati vijjamāne kusalaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiññeva khaṇādimhi samayepi vijjamāne phassādayo hontīti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthayojanā ca veditabbā.
^b^Hoti^eb^^a^V1.0037^ea^^b^cetthā^eb^ti ettha yathāvuttaatthavisaye saṅgahagāthā hoti. ^b^Aññatrā^eb^ti suttābhidhammesu. ^b^Abhilāpamattabhedo^eb^ti desanāvilāsato saddamatteneva bhedo, na atthato.

^b^Avisesenā^eb^ti sāmaññena. ^b^Iriyāpatho^eb^tiādīsu iriyāya sabbadvārikakiriyāya patho pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ tabbinimuttakammassa abhāvāti ṭhānādayo iriyāpatho, sova vihāro. Brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā parahitacittādivasappavattito mettādayo ^b^brahmavihāro^eb^ nāma. Tadavasesā pana mahaggatā sabbanīvaraṇavigamanādisiddhena jotanādiatthena ^b^dibbavihāro^eb^ nāma. Brahmavihārabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā mettādayo idha asaṅgahitā. Ariyānameva vihāroti phalasamāpattiyo ^b^ariyavihāro^eb^ nāma.

Rukkhādimūleyeva mūlasaddassa niruḷhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ aparena mūlasaddena visesetvā ‘‘mūlamūle’’ti vuttaṃ, yathā dukkhadukkhanti (vibha. aṭṭha. 190). Lobhādīnaṃ dosamūlādicittāsādhāraṇattā ‘‘asādhāraṇahetumhī’’ti vuttaṃ.

^b^Tattha siyā^eb^ti tattha verañjāyantiādīsu padesu kassaci codanā siyāti attho. Ubhayathā nidānakittanassa pana kiṃ payojananti? Āha ^b^gocaragāmanidassanattha^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^assā^eb^ti bhagavato.

Kilamova kilamatho, attano attabhāvassa kilamatho attakilamatho, tassa anu anu yogo punappunaṃ pavattanaṃ ^b^attakilamathānuyogo^eb^. Vatthukāmārammaṇe sukhe sampayogavasena līnā yuttā, kāmataṇhā ^a^M1.0042^ea^, taṃsahacarite kāme sukhe vā ārammaṇabhūte allīnā pavattatīti kāmasukhallikā taṇhā, tassā kāmasukhallikāya anu anu yogo ^b^kāmasukhallikānuyogo. Loke saṃvaḍḍhabhāva^eb^nti āmisopabhogena saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvaṃ. ^b^Uppajjamāno^eb^ bahujanahitādiatthāyeva uppajjatīti yojanā.

Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha ^b^diṭṭhī^eb^tiādi. Ettha ca ‘‘yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.324, 356; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54; a. ni. 6.12; pari. 274) evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā. ‘‘Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni…pe… samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī’’ti ^a^V1.0038^ea^ (dī. ni. 3.324, 356; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54; a. ni. 6.12; pari. 274) evaṃ vuttānañca sīlānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātena saṅghāto saṅghaṭito samaṇagaṇo, tenāti attho. ‘‘Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātasaṅghātenā’’ti vā pāṭhenettha bhavitabbaṃ, tassa diṭṭhisīlasāmaññabhūtena saṃhananena saṅghāto samaṇagaṇo, tenāti attho. Evañhi pāṭhe saddato attho yuttataro hoti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa.

^b^Brahmaṃ aṇatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^brahma^eb^-saddena vedo vuccati, so mantabrahmakappavasena tividho. Tattha iruvedādayo tayo vedā mantā, te ca padhānā, itare pana sannissitā, tena padhānasseva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Mante sajjhāyatī^eb^ti iruvedādike mantasatthe sajjhāyatīti attho. Iruvedādayo hi guttabhāsitabbatāya ‘‘mantā’’ti vuccanti. ‘‘Bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo, samitapāpattā samaṇo’’ti yathāvuttamatthadvayaṃ udāharaṇadvayena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^vuttañheta^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ ‘samaṇo’ti pavuccatī’’ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā ‘‘samitapāpattā ‘samaṇo’ti vuccatī’’ti vuttaṃ, bāhitapāpoti idaṃ pana aññasmiṃ gāthābandhe vuttavacanaṃ. ^b^Yathābhuccaguṇādhigata^eb^nti yathābhūtaguṇādhigataṃ. ^b^Sakiñcano^eb^ti sadoso.

^b^Gottavasenā^eb^ti ettha gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ, go-saddena cettha abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca vuccati. ^b^Kenaci pārijuññenā^eb^ti ñātipārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena ^a^M1.0043^ea^, parihāniyāti attho. ^b^Tato para^eb^nti verañjāyantiādivacanaṃ. ^b^Itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacana^eb^nti itthaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto āpannoti itthambhūto, tassa ākhyānaṃ itthambhūtākhyānaṃ, soyevattho itthambhūtākhyānattho. Atha vā ‘‘itthaṃ evaṃpakāro bhūto jāto’’ti evaṃ kathanattho itthambhūtākhyānattho, tasmiṃ upayogavacananti attho. Ettha ca ^b^abbhuggato^eb^ti ettha abhi-saddo itthambhūtākhyānatthajotako abhibhavitvā uggamanappakārassa dīpanato, tena yogato taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamanti idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ sāmiatthepi samāne itthambhūtākhyānadīpanato ‘‘itthambhūtākhyānatthe’’ti vuttaṃ, tenevāha ‘‘tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho’’ti.

Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā sādhu devadatto mātaramabhīti ettha abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ, evamidhāpi taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ abhi evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo uggatoti abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacananti. Sādhu devadatto mātaramabhīti ettha hi ‘‘devadatto mātaramabhi mātari visaye mātuyā vā sādhū’’ti evaṃ adhikaraṇatthe vā sāmiatthe vā bhummavacanassa sāmivacanassa vā pasaṅge itthambhūtākhyānatthajotakena ^a^V1.0039^ea^ abhisaddena yoge upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ, yathā cettha devadatto mātuvisaye mātusambandhī vā so vuttappakārappattoti ayamattho viññāyati, evamidhāpi bhoto gotamassa sambandhī kittisaddo abbhuggato abhibhavitvā uggamanapakārappattoti ayamattho viññāyati. Tattha hi devadattaggahaṇaṃ viya idha kittisaddaggahaṇaṃ, tattha mātaranti vacanaṃ viya idha taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamanti vacanaṃ, tattha sādhusaddaggahaṇaṃ viya idha uggatasaddaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Kittisaddo^eb^ti kittibhūto saddo, na kevaloti dassanatthaṃ visesitanti āha ‘‘kitti evā’’ti. Tato ^b^kittī^eb^ti thuti, tassā pakāsako ^b^saddo^eb^ kittisaddoti dassetuṃ ‘‘thutighoso vā’’ti vuttaṃ.

^b^So bhagavā^eb^ti ettha ^b^so^eb^ti pasiddhiyaṃ, yo so samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampento anuttaraṃ ^a^M1.0044^ea^ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, so loke atipākaṭoti ‘‘so bhagavā’’ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavāti ca idaṃ satthu nāmakittanaṃ, na guṇakittanaṃ. Parato pana bhagavāti guṇakittanameva. ^b^Iminā ca iminā cā^eb^ti etena arahantiādipadānaṃ paccekaṃ anekaguṇagaṇaṃ paṭicca pavattabhāvaṃ dasseti.

^b^Suvidūravidūre^eb^ti dvīhi saddehi ativiya dūreti dasseti, suvidūratā eva hi vidūratā. ^b^Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā^eb^ti iminā paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti tesaṃ vāsanāya appahīnattā, ^b^vāsanā^eb^ ca nāma nikkilesassāpi sakalañeyyānavabodhādidvārattayappayogaviguṇatāhetubhūto kilesanihito ākāro ciranigaḷitapādānaṃ nigaḷamokkhepi saṅkucitatāgamanahetuko nigaḷanihito ākāro viya. Yāya pilindavacchādīnaṃ vasalavohārādiviguṇatā hoti, ayaṃ vāsanāti gahetabbā. ^b^Ārakā^eb^ti ettha ākārassa rassattaṃ ka-kārassa ca ha-kāraṃ sānussaraṃ katvā niruttinayena ‘‘araha’’nti padasiddhi veditabbā. Evaṃ uparipi yathārahaṃ niruttinayena padasiddhi veditabbā. Yañcetaṃ saṃsāracakkanti sambandho. ^b^Puññādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena apuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhāre saṅgaṇhāti. Āsavā eva avijjādīnaṃ kāraṇattā samudayoti āha ‘‘āsavasamudayamayenā’’ti. ‘‘Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo’’ti (ma. ni. 1.103) hi vuttaṃ. Vipākakaṭattārūpappabhedo tibhavo eva ratho, tasmiṃ ^b^tibhavarathe. Saṃsāracakka^eb^nti yathāvuttakilesakammavipākasamudayo.
‘‘Khandhānañca ^a^V1.0040^ea^ paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca;

Abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, ‘saṃsāro’ti pavuccatī’’ti. (visuddhi. 2.618; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.60; a. ni. aṭṭha. 2.4.199; dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā; vibha. aṭṭha. 226 saṅkhārapadaniddesa; su. ni. aṭṭha. 2.523; udā. aṭṭha. 39; itivu. aṭṭha. 14, 58; theragā. aṭṭha. 1.67, 99; bu. vaṃ. aṭṭha. 58; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 2.1.117; cūḷani. aṭṭha. 6) –

Evaṃ vutto saṃsārova cakkaṃ viya paribbhamanato cakkaṃ, tassa cakkassa sabbe arā hatāti sambandho. ^b^Anenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. Bodhīti ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ^a^M1.0045^ea^ ettha maṇḍaṃ pasannaṃ jātanti ^b^bodhimaṇḍo. Kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasu^eb^nti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ chinditabbaṃ abhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ paricchindatīti dassetuṃ kammakkhayakaravisesanavisiṭṭhaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

Evaṃ katipayaṅgehi saṃsāracakkaṃ tadavasesaṅgehi phalabhūtanāmarūpadhammehi tibhavarathañca tasmiṃ rathe yojitasaṃsāracakkārānaṃ hananappakārañca dassetvā idāni sabbehipi dvādasahi paṭiccasamuppādaṅgehi rathavirahitameva kevalaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassa araghātanappakārabhedañca dassetuṃ ^b^athavā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^anamatagga^eb^nti anu anu amataggaṃ, sabbathā anugacchantehipi aviññātakoṭikanti attho. ^b^Avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyosānattā^eb^ti idaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ dasannaṃ arabhāvena ekattaṃ samāropetvāti vuttaṃ. Na hi tesaṃ paccekaṃ avijjāmūlakatā jarāmaraṇapariyosānatā ca atthi tathā ^b^paṭiccasamuppādapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ avuttattā. Atha vā tesampi yathārahaṃ atthato avijjāmūlakattaṃ, attano attano lakkhaṇabhūtakhaṇikajarāmaraṇavasena tappariyosānatañca sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Evañca tesaṃ paccekaṃ arabhāvo siddho hoti.

Evaṃ sabbākāraṃ saṃsāracakkameva dassetvā idāni yena ñāṇena imassa saṃsāracakkassa arānaṃ chedo bhagavato siddho, tassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa ‘‘paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. 4; 1.45) mātikā vuttattā bhavacakkāvayavesu avijjādīsu paccayapaccayuppannattā pariggahavasena pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā parato tassa atthassa nigamanavasena vuttena ^b^evamayaṃ avijjāhetū^eb^tiādikena ^b^paṭisambhidāpāḷi^eb^sahitena (paṭi. ma. 1.45) pāṭhena ^a^V1.0041^ea^ sarūpato dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, tassa ca tesuyeva avijjādīsu catusaṅkhepādivasena pavattivibhāgañca dassetvā tato paraṃ ^b^iti bhagavā^eb^tiādipāṭhena bhagavato tena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena paṭiccasamuppādassa sabbākārato paṭividdhabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna ^b^iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenā^eb^tiādinā bhagavato tena ñāṇena saṃsāracakkārānaṃ viddhaṃsitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^tattha dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ avijjā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^tiṇṇaṃ āyatanāna^eb^nti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ. Esa nayo ^b^tiṇṇaṃ phassāna^eb^ntiādīsupi. Rūpataṇhādivasena cha taṇhākāyā eva veditabbā.

^b^Saggasampatti^eb^nti ^a^M1.0046^ea^ kāmasugatīsu sampattiṃ. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti kāmupādānapaccayā eva. ^b^Brahmalokasampatti^eb^nti rūpībrahmalokasampattiṃ. Tebhūmakadhammavisayassa sabbassāpi rāgassa kilesakāmabhāvato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti āha ‘‘kāmupādānapaccayāyeva mettaṃ bhāvetī’’ti. ^b^Sesupādānamūlikāsupī^eb^ti diṭṭhupādānasīlabbatupādānaattavādupādānamūlikāsupi yojanāsu. Tatrāyaṃ yojanānayo – idhekacco ‘‘natthi paraloko ucchijjati attā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.85-86 atthato samānaṃ) diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā, aparo ‘‘asukasmiṃ bhave attā ucchijjatī’’ti diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā kāmarūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ karotītiādinā ca diṭṭhupādānamūlikā yojanā, imināva nayena attavādupādānamūlikā yojanā veditabbā. Aparo ‘‘sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī’’ti asuddhimaggaṃ ‘‘suddhimaggo’’ti parāmasanto sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā sabbabhavesu sīlabbatupādānamūlikā yojanā veditabbā.

Idāni yassa saṃsāracakkārānaṃ ghātanasamatthassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādipaccayapaaggahākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotī^eb^tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo dassito, tameva ñāṇaṃ avijjādīsu pavattiākārena saddhiṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ^eb^ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento ^b^evamaya^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotītiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayuppannabhāvo dassito, tameva ^b^paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ^eb^ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento evamayantiādimāhā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāratthadīpaniyā^eb^ vinayaṭīkāyapi ayameva pāṭho likhito. Tattha ca ^b^kāmabhave ca avijjā^eb^tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena vutto na hoti ^b^tassa ca avijjā nābhi, mūlattā^eb^tiādinā pubbeva dassitattā upari cakkarūpato ^a^V1.0042^ea^ payogattena upasaṃhārābhāvā ca. ‘‘Api ca tameva paccayapaccayuppannabhāvaṃ nigamanavasena dassento’’ti ca vuttaṃ, na cettha paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo nigamanavasena padhānattena dassito, atha kho paccayapariggahavasappavattaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇameva ^a^M1.0047^ea^ yathāvuttapaccayapariggahākārassa nigamanavasena dassitaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘evamayaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā, ubhopete dhammā hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Atītampi addhānaṃ. Anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā hetu…pe… dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.46) dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇameva padhānattena dassitaṃ. ‘‘Avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā’’tiādi pana paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti (paṭi. ma. mātikā 4; 1.45) vuccamānattā tassa paccayapariggahākāraparidīpanatthaṃ visayattena vuttaṃ, na padhānattena.

Ayañhettha attho – ^b^eva^eb^nti anantare vuttanayena ^b^ayaṃ avijjā^eb^ saṅkhārānaṃ ^b^hetu, saṅkhārā^eb^ ca tena hetunā samuppannā. ^b^Ubhopete^eb^ti yasmā ayaṃ avijjā paraparikappitapakatiissarādi viya ahetukā niccā dhuvā na hoti, atha kho ‘‘āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo’’ti (ma. ni. 1.103) vacanato sayampi sahetukā saṅkhatā aniccāyeva hoti, tasmā ubhopete avijjāsaṅkhārā hetusamuppannāyeva. ^b^Itī^eb^ti evaṃ yathāvuttanayena paccayapariggaṇhane yā paññā, taṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhāte kāraṇe yāthāvato pavattattā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ nāmāti.

Ettha hi ñāṇassa visayavibhāvanavaseneva avijjādīnaṃ paccayādibhāvo vutto, na padhānattena, ñāṇameva panettha padhānato vuttaṃ, tasmā etassa ñāṇassa paccayapariggahākāradassanatthameva heṭṭhāpi ^b^kāmabhave ca avijjā^eb^tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayādibhāvo vutto, idhāpi nigamanavasena upasaṃhaṭo, na bhavacakkadassanatthanti ayamettha attano mati.

Tattha ca paccayuppannadhammesu adiṭṭhesu hetūnaṃ paccayabhāvopi na sakkā daṭṭhunti ‘‘saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā’’ti ^b^paccayapariggahañāṇaniddese^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.45) paccayuppannadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Etena nayenā^eb^ti avijjāyaṃ vuttanayena saṅkhārā hetu, viññāṇaṃ hetusamuppannantiādinā sabbāni jātipariyosānāni padāni vitthāretabbāni.

Evaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā^eb^ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādīsu pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni tassa tesu paccayesu aññehipi ākārehi pavattiākāraṃ ^a^M1.0048^ea^ dassetuṃ ^b^tatthā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Saṅkhippanti ettha avijjādayo hetusāmaññena phalasāmaññena ^a^V1.0043^ea^ vāti ^b^saṅkhepo,^eb^ saṅgaho, koṭṭhāso rāsīti attho. So pana jātito duvidhopi kālabhedavasena catubbidho jāto. ^b^Paccuppanno addhā^eb^ti anuvattati. ^b^Taṇhupādānabhavā gahitā^eb^ kilesakammasāmaññato tadavinābhāvato ca. Avijjādikilesavaṭṭampi vipākadhammadhammatāsarikkhatāya idha kammavaṭṭamevāti āha ^b^ime pañca dhammā^eb^tiādi. Vipākā dhammātiādīsu kammajaarūpakkhandhānameva vipākasaddavacanīyattepi nāmarūpādipadesu rūpamissampi phalapañcakaṃ arūpappadhānatāya ca tabbahulatāya ca ‘‘vipākavaṭṭa’’nti vuttaṃ. Vipākappadhānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, vipākabahulaṃ vā vaṭṭanti attho. Kammajapariyāyo vā ettha vipāka-saddo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Jātijarāmaraṇāpadesenā^eb^ti paramatthadhammavinimuttajātijarāmaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti tadapadesena tesaṃ kathanena taṃmukhenāti attho. Ākirīyanti pakāsīyantīti ^b^ākārā,^eb^ avijjādisarūpā, tato paccayākāratoti attho. ^b^Eko sandhī^eb^ti avicchedappavattihetubhūto hetuphalasandhi, dutiyo phalahetusandhi, tatiyo hetuphalasandhīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

Evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādīsu anekehi pakārehi pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni tehi, avuttehi ca sabbehi ākārehi bhagavato paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭividdhabhāvaṃ, tassa ca ñāṇassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇasaddappavattinimittataṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāpāḷi^eb^nayena dassetuṃ upasaṃhāravasena ^b^iti bhagavā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ, tenāha ^b^catusaṅkhepa^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sabbākārato^eb^ti idha kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayotiādinā idha vuttehi ca avuttehi ca ^b^paṭiccasamuppāda^eb^vibhaṅgādīsu (vibha. 225 ādayo) āgatehi sabbehi pakārehi paṭivijjhati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti yena ñāṇena bhagavā evaṃ jānāti, taṃ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^Ñātaṭṭhenā^eb^ti jānanaṭṭhena. ^b^Pajānanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.

Idāni yamidaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ paccayapariggahākārabhedehi saddhiṃ papañcato dassitaṃ, tasmiṃ araghāte etassa upayogitaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena are hanīti sambandho. Kathanti? Āha ^b^‘‘te dhamme’’^eb^tiādi. Te avijjādike dhamme mahāvajirañāṇāvudhena ^a^M1.0049^ea^ tena ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena yathābhūtaṃ^eb^ ñatvā tena balavavipassanāvudhena ^b^nibbindanto^eb^ ariyamaggāvudhena ^b^virajjanto vimuccanto are hanī^eb^ti yojanā. Ariyamaggañāṇampi hi kiccato samudayasaccādibodhato ‘‘dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa’’nti vuccati.

Ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjemīti dhammakkhandhaṃ ārabbha pavattāpi vihārakaraṇapūjā bhagavati pemeneva pavattattā sadhātukādicetiyapaṭimaṇḍitattā ca bhagavatova pūjāti ^a^V1.0044^ea^ āha ^b^bhagavantaṃ uddissā^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kilesārīna so munī^eb^ti ettha niggahītalopo, kilesārīnaṃ hatattāti attho. ^b^Paccayādīna cāraho^eb^ti etthāpi niggahītalopo daṭṭhabbo.

^b^Sammāsambuddho^eb^ti ettha ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo sayanti atthe pavattatīti āha ‘‘sāma’’nti, aparaneyyo hutvāti attho. ^b^Sabbadhammāna^eb^nti idaṃ kassaci visayavisesassa aggahitattā siddhaṃ. Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati, yathā dikkhito na dadātīti. Evañca katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattariyeva buddha-saddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato. ‘‘Sammā sāmaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho’’ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati. ^b^Sabbadhammāna^eb^nti idaṃ pana atthato labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na hi bujjhanakiriyā avisayā yujjati. ^b^Abhiññeyye^eb^ti lakkhaṇādito aniccādito ca abhivisiṭṭhena lokiyalokuttarañāṇena jānitabbe catusaccadhamme. ^b^Pariññeyye^eb^ti aniccādivasena paricchinditvā jānitabbaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha. ^b^Pahātabbe^eb^ti samudayasaccaṃ. ^b^Sacchikātabbe^eb^ti nirodhasaccaṃ. Bahuvacananiddeso panettha sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedaṃ apekkhitvā kato.

^b^Abhiññeyya^eb^nti gāthāya pahātabbabhāvetabbānaṃ samudayamaggasaccānaṃ hetudhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva tapphalānaṃ dukkhasaccanirodhasaccānampi siddhito pariññātabbañca pariññātaṃ sacchikātabbañca sacchikatanti idampettha saṅgahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tenāha ‘‘tasmā buddhosmī’’ti. Yasmā cattāripi saccāni mayā buddhāni, ^b^tasmā^eb^ sabbampi ñeyyaṃ ^b^buddhosmi,^eb^ abbhaññāsinti attho.

Vicittavisayapatthanākārappavattiyā taṇhā dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇanti āha ‘‘mūlakāraṇabhāvenā’’ti. ^b^Ubhinna^eb^nti cakkhussa taṃsamudayassa ca. ^b^Appavattī^eb^ti appavattinimittaṃ, na abhāvamattaṃ. Tassa avatthuttā ^a^M1.0050^ea^ sappaccayattādianekabhedā sabbasaṅgahitā. ^b^Nirodhappajānanā^eb^ti sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nirodhassa paṭivijjhanā. ^b^Ekekapaduddhārenāpī^eb^ti cakkhu cakkhusamudayotiādinā ekekakoṭṭhāsaniddhāraṇenāpi, na dukkhasaccādisāmaññato evāti adhippāyo. Taṇhāyapi saṅkhāradukkhapariyāpannatāya pariññeyyattā dukkhasaccabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘cha taṇhākāyā’’ti vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana attabhāve sā uppajjati, tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā samudayasaccanti gahetabbā. ^b^Kasiṇānī^eb^ti kasiṇārammaṇāni jhānāni. ^b^Dvattiṃsākārā^eb^ti kesādayo tadārammaṇajjhānāni ca. ^b^Nava bhavā^eb^ti kāmabhavādayo tayo saññībhavādayo tayo ekavokārabhavādayo tayo cāti nava bhavā. ^b^Cattāri jhānānī^eb^ti ārammaṇavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā sāmaññato cattāri jhānāni vuttāni. Vipākakiriyānampi yathārahaṃ ^a^V1.0045^ea^ sabbattha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā taṇhāsamuṭṭhāpikāti veditabbā, kiriyadhammānaṃ pana tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā taṇhā. ^b^Anulomato^eb^ti ettha avijjā dukkhasaccaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā āsavā samudayasaccanti yojetabbaṃ. Saṅkhārādīsu pana avijjādayova samudayasaccabhāvena yojetabbā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti tasmā.

^b^Vijjā^eb^ti attano visayaṃ viditaṃ karotīti vijjā. ^b^Sampannattā^eb^ti samannāgatattā, sampuṇṇattā vā. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti ambaṭṭhasutte. ^b^Manomayiddhiyā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminātī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.236) vuttattā sarīrabbhantarajhānamanena aññassa sarīrassa nibbattivasena pavattā manomayiddhi nāma, sā atthato jhānasampayuttā paññāyeva. ^b^Satta saddhammā^eb^ nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca. ^b^Gacchati amataṃ disa^eb^nti dukkhanittharaṇatthikehi daṭṭhabbato amataṃ nibbānameva disaṃ gacchati, iminā ca caraṇānaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaariyamaggabhāvato nibbānatthikehi ekaṃsena icchitabbataṃ dasseti. Idānissā vijjācaraṇasampadāya sāvakādiasādhāraṇataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^tattha vijjāsampadā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āsavakkhayavijjāvasena sabbaññutā sijjhati, caraṇadhammabhūtesu jhānesu ^a^M1.0051^ea^ antogadhāya mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā vasena mahākāruṇikatā sijjhatīti āha ‘‘vijjā…pe… mahākāruṇikata’’nti. ^b^Yathā ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ, yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno buddho niyojeti, tathā ayampīti attho. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti anatthaparivajjanaatthaniyojanena. ^b^Attantapādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena parantapaubhayantapā gahitā. ^b^Asajjamāno bhavesu apaccāgacchanto^eb^ti pahīnānaṃ punānuppattito na puna upagacchanto.

^b^Tatrā^eb^ti yuttavācābhāsane sādhetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. ^b^Abhūta^eb^nti abhūtatthaṃ. ^b^Ataccha^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti pisuṇādidosayuttaṃ. ^b^Sammāgadattā^eb^ti sundaravacanattā, gadanaṃ gado, kathananti attho. Sundaro gado vacanamassāti ‘‘sugado’’ti vattabbe niruttinayena da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘sugato’’ti vuttaṃ.

^b^Sabhāvato^eb^ti dukkhasabhāvato. ^b^Loka^eb^nti khandhādilokaṃ. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttato āha ^b^yatthā^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ lokantasaṅkhāte nibbāne. ^b^Ta^eb^nti lokassantaṃ, okāsaloke kāyagamanena ñātabbaṃ pattabbanti nāhaṃ vadāmīti yojanā. Idañca rohitadevaputtena lokassa kāyagativasena antagamanassa pucchitattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Appatvā lokassanta^eb^nti khandhādilokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

Kinte ^a^V1.0046^ea^ padasā okāsalokaparibbhamanena, parimitaṭṭhāne eva taṃ ñāṇagamanena gacchantānaṃ dassemīti dassento ^b^api cā^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^byāmamatte kaḷevare^eb^ti sarīre. Tena rūpakkhandhaṃ dasseti. ^b^Sasaññimhī^eb^ti saññāsīsena vedanādayo tayo khandhe. ^b^Samanake^eb^ti viññāṇakkhandhaṃ. ^b^Loka^eb^nti khandhādilokaṃ, dukkhanti attho. ^b^Lokanirodha^eb^nti nibbānena lokassa nirujjhanaṃ, nibbānameva vā. Adesampi hi nibbānaṃ yesaṃ nirodhāya hoti, upacārato tannissitaṃ viya hotīti ‘‘byāmamatte kaḷevare lokanirodhampi paññapemī’’ti vuttaṃ, cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ, sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā nirujjhamānā nirujjhatītiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.401; vibha. 204) viya. ^b^Kudācana^eb^nti kadācipi. ^b^Appatvā^eb^ti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā taṃ gamanena pattuṃ na sakkā, tasmā. ^b^Have^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, ekaṃsatthe vā ^a^M1.0052^ea^. ^b^Lokavidū^eb^ti sabhāvādito khandhādijānanako. Catusaccadhammānaṃ abhisamitattā ^b^samitāvī,^eb^ samitakilesoti vā attho. ^b^Nāsīsati^eb^ na pattheti appaṭisandhikattā.

Evaṃ saṅkhepato lokaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^api ca tayo lokā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūhasantānabhūto ^b^sattaloko^eb^. So hi rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya ‘‘satto’’ti ca, lokiyanti ettha kammakilesā tabbipākā cāti ‘‘loko’’ti ca vuccati. Anindriyabaddhānaṃ utujarūpānaṃ samūhasantānabhūto ^b^okāsaloko^eb^. So hi sattasaṅkhārānaṃ ādhārato ‘‘okāso’’ti ca, lokiyanti ettha tassādhārā ca ādheyyabhūtāti ‘‘loko’’ti ca pavuccati. Indriyānindriyabaddhā pana sabbeva upādānakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkhataṭṭhena lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena ca ‘‘saṅkhāraloko’’ti ca vuccati. Āharati attano phalanti āhāro, paccayo. Tena tiṭṭhanasīlā uppajjitvā yāva bhaṅgā pavattanasīlāti ^b^āhāraṭṭhitikā,^eb^ sabbe saṅkhatadhammā. ^b^Sabbe sattā^eb^ti ca imināpi veneyyānurūpato puggalādhiṭṭhānattā desanāya saṅkhārāva gahitā.

^b^Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantī^eb^ti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti pavattanti. ^b^Virocanā^eb^ti tesaṃ virocanahetu obhāsanahetūti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. ^b^Disā bhantī^eb^ti sabbā disā yāvatā vigatandhakārā paññāyanti. Atha vā ^b^disā^eb^ti upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Tasmā virocamānā candimasūriyā yattakā disā bhanti obhāsentīti attho. ^b^Tāva sahassadhā loko^eb^ti tattakena pamāṇena sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassacakkavāḷānīti attho. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti sahassacakkavāḷe. ^b^Vaso^eb^ti iddhisaṅkhāto vaso vattatīti attho.

^b^Tampī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0047^ea^ tividhampi lokaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti anena bhagavatā saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho. ^b^Eko loko^eb^ti yvāyaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ paccayāyattavuttito tena sāmaññena saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho, esa nayo sesesupi. Sabbatthāpi lokiyadhammāva lokoti adhippetā lokuttarānaṃ pariññeyyattābhāvā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandhā. Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0053^ea^ tathā tathā samuppannā pajāyeva vuccanti. Nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, heṭṭhimā ca tayo āruppāti imā sattavidhā pajāyeva viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nāma. Tattha nānattaṃ kāyo etesamatthīti nānattakāyā. Nānattaṃ saññā etesanti nānattasaññino. Saññāsīsenettha paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ, esa nayo sesesupi.

Tattha sabbamanussā ca cha kāmāvacaradevā ca ^b^nānattakāyā nānattasaññino^eb^ nāma. Tesañhi aññamaññaṃ visadisatāya nānā kāyo, paṭisandhisaññā ca navavidhatāya nānā. Tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu brahmakāyikā ceva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca ^b^nānattakāyā ekattasaññino^eb^ nāma. Tesu hi brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi sarīraṃ aññamaññaṃ visadisaṃ, paṭisandhisaññā pana paṭhamajjhānavipākavasena ekāva, tathā āpāyikānampi, tesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ akusalavipākāhetukāva paṭisandhisaññā. Dutiyajjhānabhūmikā ca parittābha appamāṇābha ābhassarā ^b^ekattakāyā nānattasaññino^eb^ nāma. Tesañhi sabbesaṃ ekappamāṇova kāyo, paṭisandhisaññā pana dutiyatatiyajjhānavipākavasena nānā hoti. Tatiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ parittasubhādayo tayo, catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ asaññasattavajjitā vehapphalā, pañca ca suddhāvāsāti navasu bhūmīsu sattā ^b^ekattakāyā ekattasaññino^eb^ nāma. Ābhānānattena pana sabbattha kāyanānattaṃ na gayhati, saṇṭhānanānatteneva gayhatīti. Asaññasattā viññāṇābhāvena viññāṇaṭṭhitisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchanti. Nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ pana yathā saññāya, evaṃ viññāṇassāpi sukhumattā nevaviññāṇaṃ nāviññāṇaṃ, tasmā paribyattaviññāṇakiccavantesu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na gayhati. Tasmā sesāni ākāsānañcāyatanādīni tīṇiyeva gahitāni, tehi saddhiṃ imā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti veditabbā.

^b^Aṭṭha lokadhammā^eb^ti lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti ime aṭṭha lokassa sabhāvattā lokadhammā. Lābhālābhādipaccayā uppajjanakā panettha anurodhavirodhā vā lābhādisaddehi vuttāti veditabbā. ^b^Nava sattāvāsā^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo ^a^M1.0054^ea^ eva ^a^V1.0048^ea^ asaññasattacatutthāruppehi saddhiṃ ‘‘nava sattāvāsā’’ti vuccanti. Sattā āvasanti etthāti sattāvāsā, sattanikāyo, atthato tathā pavattā pajā eva idha saṅkhāralokabhāvena gayhantīti veditabbā. ^b^Dasāyatanānī^eb^ti dhammāyatanamanāyatanavajjitāni dasa.

Ettha ca tīsu bhavesu assādadassanavasena tisso vedanāva lokabhāvena vuttā, tathā paccayadassanavasena cattārova āhārā. Attaggāhanimittadassanavasena cha ajjhattikāneva āyatanāni. Thūlasaññībhavadassanavasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyova, anurodhavirodhadassanavasena aṭṭha lokadhammā vā, thūlāyatanadassanavasena dasāyatanāneva lokabhāvena vuttāni. Tesaṃ gahaṇeneva tannissayatappaṭibaddhā tadārammaṇā sabbe tebhūmakā nāmarūpadhammā atthato gahitā eva honti. Sesehi pana ekavidhādikoṭṭhāsehi sarūpeneva te gahitāti veditabbaṃ.

^b^Āsayaṃ jānātī^eb^tiādīsu āhacca cittaṃ ettha setīti āsayo, aññasmiṃ visaye pavattitvāpi cittaṃ yattha sarasena pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so vaṭṭāsayo vivaṭṭāsayoti duvidho. Tattha vaṭṭāsayopi sassatucchedadiṭṭhivasena duvidho. Vivaṭṭāsayo pana vipassanāsaṅkhātā anulomikā khanti, maggasaṅkhātaṃ yathābhūtañāṇañcāti duvidho. Yathāha –
‘‘Sassatucchedadiṭṭhi ca, khanti cevānulomikaṃ;
Yathābhūtañca yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, etaṃ āsayasaddita’’nti. (sārattha. ṭī. 1.verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanā);

Etaṃ duvidhampi āsayaṃ sattānaṃ appavattikkhaṇeyeva bhagavā sabbathā jānāti. ^b^Anusaya^eb^nti kāmarāgānusayādivasena sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ. ^b^Carita^eb^nti ‘‘sucaritaduccarita’’nti ^b^niddese^eb^ vuttaṃ. Atha vā caritanti cariyā, te rāgādayo cha mūlacariyā, saṃsaggasannipātavasena anekavidhā honti. ^b^Adhimutti^eb^nti ajjhāsayadhātuṃ, tattha tattha cittassa abhirucivasena ninnatā, sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti. Yāya dussīlādike hīnādhimuttike ^a^M1.0055^ea^ sevanti, sā ^b^hīnādhimutti^eb^. Yāya paṇītādhimuttike sevanti, sā ^b^paṇītādhimutti^eb^. Taṃ duvidhampi adhimuttiṃ bhagavā sabbākārato jānāti. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etesanti ^b^apparajakkhā,^eb^ anussadarāgādidosā. Ussadarāgādidosā ^b^mahārajakkhā^eb^. Upanissayabhūtehi tikkhehi saddhādiindriyehi mudukehi ca samannāgatā ^b^tikkhindriyā mudindriyā^eb^ ca. Heṭṭhā vuttehi āsayādīhi sundarehi asundarehi ca samannāgatā ^b^svākārā dvākārā^eb^ ca veditabbā. Sammattaniyāmaṃ ^a^V1.0049^ea^ viññāpetuṃ sukarā ^b^suviññāpayā,^eb^ viparītā ^b^duviññāpayā^eb^. Maggaphalapaṭivedhāya upanissayasampannā ^b^bhabbā,^eb^ viparītā ^b^abhabbā^eb^. Evaṃ sattasantānagatadhammavisesajānaneneva ^b^sattaloko^eb^pi ^b^vidito^eb^ dhammavinimuttassa sattassa abhāvāti veditabbaṃ.

^b^Ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ…pe… paññāsañca yojanānī^eb^ti ettha hotīti seso. ^b^Parikkhepato^eb^ pamāṇaṃ vuccatīti seso. Cakkavāḷassa sabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ chattiṃsa satasahassāni…pe… satāni ca hontīti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti cakkavāḷe, dve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca yojanāni yāni ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ bahalattena ayaṃ vasundharā saṅkhātāti yojanā. Tattha ^b^ettaka^eb^nti kiriyāvisesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sandhārakaṃ jalaṃ ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhitanti yojanā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti cakkavāḷe. ^b^Ajjhogāḷhuggatā^eb^ti ajjhogāḷhā ca uggatā ca. ^b^Brahā^eb^ti mahantā. ^b^Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañcā^eb^ti yojanānaṃ pañcasatāni ucco ubbedho. ^b^Tipañcayojanakkhandhaparikkhepā^eb^ti pannarasayojanappamāṇakkhandhapariṇāhā. ^b^Nagavhayā^eb^ti rukkhābhidhānā jambūti yojanā. ^b^Samantato^eb^ti sabbasobhāgena, āyāmato ca vitthārato ca satayojanavitthārāti attho. ^b^Yassānubhāvenā^eb^ti yassā mahantatākappaṭṭhāyikādippakārena pabhāvena. ^b^Parikkhipitvā taṃ sabbaṃ, lokadhātumayaṃ ṭhito^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi taṃ parikkhipitvā ^b^cakkavāḷasiluccayo^eb^ ṭhito, ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ ekā ^b^lokadhātu^eb^ nāmāti attho, ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. Atha vā taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātuṃ parikkhipitvā ayaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhitoti yojetabbaṃ.

^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0056^ea^ tassaṃ lokadhātuyaṃ. ^b^Tāvatiṃsabhavana^eb^nti tidasapuraṃ. ^b^Asurabhavana^eb^nti asurapuraṃ. Avīcimahānirayo ca tathā dasasahassayojano, so pana catunnaṃ lohabhittīnamantarā yojanasatāyāmavitthāropi samantā soḷasahi ussadanirayehi saddhiṃ dasasahassayojano vuttoti veditabbo. ^b^Tadanantaresū^eb^ti tesaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu. Lokānaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare vivare bhavattā ^b^lokantarikā^eb^. Tiṇṇañhi sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā āsannaṭṭhapitānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu ekeko lokantarikanirayo aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo sītanarako sattānaṃ akusalavipākena nibbattati. ^b^Anantānī^eb^ti tiriyaṃ aṭṭhasu disāsu cakkavāḷāni ākāso viya anantāni. Uddhaṃ pana adho ca antāneva. ^b^Anantena buddhañāṇenā^eb^ti ettha anantañeyyapaṭivedhasāmatthiyayogatova ñāṇaṃ ‘‘ananta’’nti veditabbaṃ.

^b^Attano^eb^ti nissakke sāmivacanametaṃ, attatoti attho. Guṇehi attano visiṭṭhatarassāti ^a^V1.0050^ea^ sambandho, taraggahaṇañcettha anuttaroti padassa atthaniddesavasena kataṃ, na visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthitāya. Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso, tenāha ^b^sīlaguṇenāpi asamo^eb^tiādi. Tattha asamehi sammāsambuddhehi samo ^b^asamasamo^eb^. Natthi paṭimā etassāti ^b^appaṭimo^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tattha upamāmattaṃ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo. Yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭimo puggaloti veditabbo. ^b^Attanā^eb^ti attato. ^b^Purisadamme^eb^tiādīsu damitabbā dammā, ‘‘dammapurisā’’ti vattabbe visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā ‘‘purisadammā’’ti vuttaṃ, purisaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhavasena itthīnampi dametabbato. ^b^Nibbisā katā^eb^ dosavisassa vinodanena. ^b^Atthapada^eb^nti atthābhibyañjanakaṃ padaṃ, vākyanti attho. Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti, tenāha ^b^bhagavā hī^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aṭṭha disā^eb^ti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. ^b^Asajjamānā^eb^ti vasībhāvappattiyā nissaṅgacārā.

Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti ^b^diṭṭhadhammiko,^eb^ idhalokattho. Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato samāgantabbato samparāyo ^a^M1.0057^ea^, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti ^b^samparāyiko,^eb^ paralokattho. Paramo uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṃ. Saha atthena vattatīti ^b^sattho,^eb^ bhaṇḍamūlena vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gacchanto janasamūho. So assa atthīti satthā, ^b^satthavāho^eb^ti niruttinayena. So viya bhagavāti āha ‘‘satthā, bhagavā satthavāho’’ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ ^b^yathā satthavāho^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^satthe^eb^ti satthike jane. Kaṃ udakaṃ tārenti etthāti ^b^kantāro,^eb^ nirudako araññappadeso. Corādīhi adhiṭṭhitaaraññappadesāpi duggamanaṭṭhena taṃsadisatāya kantārātveva niruḷhāti sāmaññato ‘‘kantāraṃ tāretī’’ti vatvā taṃ vivaranto ^b^corakantāra^eb^ntiādimāha.

^b^Bhagavato^eb^ti nissakke sāmivacanaṃ, bhagavantato dhammassavanenāti attho. Yathā ‘‘upajjhāyato ajjhetī’’ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho. ^b^Sare nimittaṃ aggahesī^eb^ti pubbabuddhuppādesu saddhammassavanaparicayena ‘‘dhammo eso vuccatī’’ti sare ākāraṃ gaṇhi. Pubbābhiyogavaseneva hi īdisānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ dhammassavanādīsu pasādo uppajjati vagguliādīnaṃ viya. Itarathā sabbatiracchānānampi tathā pasāduppattippasaṅgato. Yadi hi uppajjeyya, bhagavā anantacakkavāḷesu sabbasattānampi ekakkhaṇe sappāṭihāriyadhammaṃ sāvetuṃ sakkotīti sabbasattānampi ito pubbeva vimuttippasaṅgo siyā. Ye pana devamanussanāgasupaṇṇādayo pakatiyāva kammassakataññāṇādiyuttā honti, teyeva pubbe anupanissayāpi ^a^V1.0051^ea^ bhagavato saddhammassavanādinā paṭhamaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pasādaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti, na itareti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Are ahampi nāmā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘kutohaṃ idha nibbattoti oloketvā maṇḍūkabhāvatoti ñatvā’’ti idaṃ ettakampi are ahampi nāmāti vimhayavacaneneva sijjhatīti avuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Jala^eb^nti jalanto vijjotamāno. ^b^Maṇḍūkoha^eb^nti gāthāya ^b^udake^eb^ti sañjātaṭṭhānadassanaṃ, tena thalamaṇḍūkatā nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Udake jātānampi kacchapādīnaṃ thalagocaratāpi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ ‘‘vārigocaro’’ti vuttaṃ, udakasañcārīti attho.

^b^Vimokkhantikañāṇavasenā^eb^ti ettha sabbaso kilesehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo, tassa anto, aggaphalaṃ, tattha bhavaṃ vimokkhantikaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ sabbampi buddhañāṇaṃ. Idāni sammāsambuddhapadato buddhapadassa ^a^M1.0058^ea^ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^yasmā vā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sammāsambuddhapadena hi satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo vutto, iminā pana buddhapadena desanāñāṇānubhāvopi, tenāha ^b^aññepi satte bodhesī^eb^tiādi.

^b^Guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarugāravādhivacana^eb^nti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuccamānavacanamidaṃ ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^Seṭṭha^eb^nti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. ^b^Uttama^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Garugāravayutto^eb^ti ettha garubhāvo gāravaṃ, garuguṇayogato garukaraṇaṃ vā gāravaṃ, tena sāvakādīnaṃ asādhāraṇatāya garubhūtena mahantena gāravena yuttoti garugāravayutto. Atha vā garu ca sabbalokassa sikkhakattā teneva gāravayutto cātipi yojetabbaṃ.

Avatthāya viditaṃ ^b^āvatthikaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^liṅgikaṃ^eb^. Nimittato āgataṃ ^b^nemittikaṃ^eb^. Adhicca yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ adhivacanavasena anapekkhitvā pavattaṃ ^b^adhiccasamuppannaṃ,^eb^ tenāha ‘‘vacanatthamanapekkhitvā’’ti. Yadicchāya āgataṃ yādicchakaṃ. Ettha ca bāhiraṃ daṇḍādi ^b^liṅgaṃ,^eb^ abbhantaraṃ tevijjādi ^b^nimittaṃ^eb^. Pacurajanavisayaṃ vā dissamānaṃ ^b^liṅgaṃ,^eb^ tabbiparītaṃ ^b^nimitta^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sacchikāpaññattī^eb^ti sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyānimittā paññatti. Atha vā ^b^sacchikāpaññattī^eb^ti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti. Yaṃguṇanimittā hi sā, te guṇā satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti, na paresaṃ, vohāramattenāti adhippāyo. ^b^Yaṃguṇanemittika^eb^nti yehi guṇehi nimittabhūtehi ^b^etaṃ nāmaṃ^eb^ nemittikañca jātaṃ. ^b^Vadantī^eb^ti dhammasenāpatissa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṃ sandhāya.

Issariyādibhedo ^a^V1.0052^ea^ bhago assa atthīti ^b^bhagī^eb^. Maggaphalādiariyaguṇaṃ araññādivivekaṭṭhānañca bhaji sevi sīlenāti ^b^bhajī^eb^. Cīvarādipaccayānaṃ attharasādīnañca sīlādiguṇānañca ^b^bhāgī,^eb^ dāyādoti attho. Vibhaji uddesaniddesādippakārehi dhammaratanaṃ pavibhajīti ^b^vibhattavā^eb^. Rāgādipāpadhammaṃ ^b^bhaggaṃ akāsīti bhagavā^eb^ti vuccatīti sabbattha sambandho. Garupi loke bhagavāti vuccatīti āha ‘‘garū’’ti, yasmā garu, tasmāpi bhagavāti attho. Pāramitāsaṅkhātaṃ ^a^M1.0059^ea^ bhagyamassa atthīti ^b^bhagyavā. Bahūhi ñāyehī^eb^ti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi bhāvanākkamehi. ^b^Subhāvitattano^eb^ti paccatte etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, tena subhāvitasabhāvoti attho. Bhavānaṃ antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti ^b^bhavantago^eb^. Tattha tattha bhagavāti saddasiddhi niruttinayeneva veditabbā.

Idāni bhagī bhajīti niddesagāthāya navahi padehi dassitamatthaṃ bhagyavāti gāthāya chahi padehi saṅgahetvā padasiddhiṃ atthayojanānayabhedehi saddhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^ayaṃ pana aparo nayo^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^vaṇṇavipariyayo^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, teneva vaṇṇavikāro vaṇṇalopo dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Saddanayenā^eb^ti saddalakkhaṇanayena. Pisodarādīnaṃ saddānaṃ ākatigaṇabhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā’’^eb^ti. Pakkhipanameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Tappariyāpannatākaraṇañhi pakkhipanaṃ. ^b^Bhagya^eb^nti kusalaṃ.

Lobhādayo cattāro dosā ekakavasena gahitā. Ahirikādayo dukavasena. Akkocchimantiādinā (dha. pa. 3-4) punappunaṃ kujjhanavasena cittapariyonandhano kodhova ^b^upanāho^eb^. Paresaṃ pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa nipuñchano ^b^makkho^eb^ nāma. Bahussutādīhi saddhiṃ yugaggāho attano samakaraṇaṃ ^b^palāso^eb^. Attano vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanā ^b^māyā^eb^. Avijjamānaguṇappakāsanaṃ ^b^sāṭheyyaṃ^eb^. Garūsupi thaddhatā anonatatā ^b^thambho^eb^. Taduttarikaraṇalakkhaṇo ^b^sārambho^eb^. Jātiādiṃ nissāya unnatilakkhaṇo ^b^māno^eb^. Abbhunnatilakkhaṇo ^b^atimāno^eb^. Jātiādiṃ nissāya majjanākārappatto mānova ^b^mado^eb^ nāma. So sattavīsatividho. Kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo ^b^pamādo^eb^. Kāyaduccaritādīni ^b^tividhaduccaritāni^eb^. Taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritavasena ^b^tividhasaṃkilesā^eb^. Rāgadosamohāva ^b^malāni^eb^. Teyeva kāyaduccaritādayo ca ^b^tividhavisamāni^eb^. Kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāsaññā ^b^tividhasaññā^eb^ nāma. Teyeva ^b^vitakkā^eb^. Taṇhādiṭṭhimānā ^b^papañcā^eb^. Subhasukhaniccaattavipariyesā ^b^catubbidhavipariyesā^eb^. Chandādayo ^b^agati^eb^. Cīvarādīsu paccayesu lobhā ^b^cattāro taṇhupādā^eb^. Buddhadhammasaṅghasikkhāsu kaṅkhā, sabrahmacārīsu kopo ca ^a^M1.0060^ea^^b^pañca cetokhīlā^eb^. Kāme kāye rūpe ca avītarāgatā, yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyogo, aññataraṃ ^a^V1.0053^ea^ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyacaraṇañca ^b^pañca cetovinibandhā^eb^. Rūpābhinandanādayo ^b^pañca abhinandanā^eb^. Kodhamakkhaissāsāṭheyyapāpicchatāsandiṭṭhiparāmāsā ^b^cha vivādamūlāni^eb^. Rūpataṇhādayo ^b^cha taṇhākāyā^eb^. Micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭhamaggaṅgapaṭipakkhā ^b^micchattā^eb^. Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo, taṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, taṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, taṃ paṭicca pariggaho, taṃ paṭicca macchariyaṃ, taṃ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ daṇḍādānādianekākusalarāsīti ^b^nava taṇhāmūlakā^eb^ dhammā. Pāṇātipātādayo ^b^dasa akusalakammapathā^eb^. Cattāro sassatavādā tathā ekaccasassatavādā antānantikā amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā soḷasa saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta ucchedavādā pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti etāni ^b^dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni^eb^. Rūpataṇhādichataṇhā eva paccekaṃ kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhāvasena aṭṭhārasa honti, tā ajjhattabahiddharūpādīsu pavattivasena chattiṃsa, puna kālattayavasena ^b^aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni^eb^ honti. ^b^Pabheda^eb^-saddaṃ paccekaṃ sambandhitvā lobhappabhedotiādinā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbadarathapariḷāhakilesasatasahassānī^eb^ti sabbāni sattānaṃ darathasaṅkhātapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni, ārammaṇādivibhāgato pavattiākāravibhāgato ca nesaṃ evaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Pañca māre abhañjīti sambandho. ^b^Parissayāna^eb^nti upaddavānaṃ.

Evaṃ bhagyavā bhaggavāti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ vibhajitvā idāni tehi dvīhi gahitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^bhagyavantatāya cassā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassā^eb^ti anekasatapuññanibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇadharassa bhagavato. ^b^Sakacitte issariyaṃ^eb^ nāma paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivasappavattiyā ceva cetosamādhivasena ca attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanameva. ^b^Aṇimā laghimādika^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā. Tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṃ ^b^aṇimā^eb^. Ākāse padasā ^a^M1.0061^ea^ gamanādiarahabhāvena lahubhāvo ^b^laghimā^eb^. Kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṃ ^b^mahimā^eb^. Iṭṭhadesassa pāpuṇanaṃ ^b^patti^eb^. Adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitatthanipphādanaṃ ^b^pākammaṃ^eb^. Sayaṃvasitā issarabhāvo ^b^īsitā^eb^. Iddhividhe vasībhāvo ^b^vasitā^eb^. Ākāsena vā gacchato, aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti ^b^yatthakāmāvasāyitā,^eb^ ‘‘kumārakarūpādidassana’’ntipi vadanti. ^b^Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasirī^eb^ti sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sobhā. ^b^Atthī^eb^ti anuvattati. Lahusādhanaṃ taṃ taṃ kālikaṃ icchitaṃ, garusādhanaṃ cirakālikaṃ buddhattādipatthitaṃ ^a^V1.0054^ea^. ^b^Bhagā assa santīti bhagavā^eb^ti idaṃ saddasatthanayena siddhaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ niruttinayena siddhanti veditabbaṃ.

^b^Pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhenā^eb^tiādīsu pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭhotiādinā attha-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha attano sabhāvena pīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ. Tassa yo pīḷanameva attho ‘‘pīḷanaṭṭho’’ti vuccati, so sabhāvo. Yasmā pana taṃsamudayena saṅkhataṃ, tasmā ^b^saṅkhataṭṭho^eb^ samudayadassanena āvibhūto. Yasmā ca maggo kilesasantāpaharattā susītalo, tasmāssa maggadassanena ^b^santāpaṭṭho^eb^ āvibhūto tappaṭiyogattā. Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanena ^b^vipariṇāmaṭṭho^eb^ āvibhūtoti. Ekasseva sabhāvadhammassa sakabhāvato itarasaccattayanivattito ca parikappetabbattā cattāro atthā vuttā. Samudayassa pana rāsikaraṇato ^b^āyūhanaṭṭho^eb^ sabhāvo, tasseva dukkhadassanena ^b^nidānaṭṭho^eb^ āvibhūto. Visaṃyogabhūtassa nirodhassa dassanena ^b^saṃyogaṭṭho^eb^. Niyyānabhūtassa maggassa dassanena ^b^palibodhaṭṭho^eb^ āvibhūto.

Nirodhassa pana ^b^nissaraṇaṭṭho^eb^ sabhāvo, tasseva samudayadassanena ^b^vivekaṭṭho^eb^ āvibhūto. Saṅkhatassa maggassa dassanena ^b^asaṅkhataṭṭho,^eb^ visayabhūtassa maraṇadhammassa vā dukkhassa dassanena ^b^amataṭṭho^eb^. Maggassa pana ^b^niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ sabhāvo, tasseva samudayadassanena dukkhassevāyaṃ hetu, nibbānappattiyā pana ayameva hetūti ^b^hetvaṭṭho,^eb^ atisukhumanirodhadassanena idhameva dassananti ^b^dassanaṭṭho,^eb^ adhikapaṇassa dukkhassa dassanena ^b^adhipateyyaṭṭho^eb^ āvibhūto. Ete eva ca pīḷanādayo soḷasa ākārāti vuccanti.

Kāmehi ^a^M1.0062^ea^ vivekaṭṭhakāyatā ^b^kāyaviveko^eb^. Nīvaraṇādīhi vivittā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ^b^cittaviveko^eb^. Upadhīyanti ettha yathāsakaṃ phalānīti upadhayo, pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātakāmakhandhakilesaabhisaṅkhārā, tehi catūhi vivittaṃ nibbānaṃ ^b^upadhiviveko^eb^ nāma.

Anattānupassanāya paṭiladdho dukkhāniccānupassanāhi ca paṭiladdho ariyamaggo āgamanavasena yathākkamaṃ ^b^suññataappaṇihitaanimittavimokkha^eb^saññaṃ paṭilabhati, kilesehi vimuttattā hi esa vimokkhoti.
Yathā loke ekekapadato ekekamakkharaṃ gahetvā ‘‘mekhalā’’ti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpīti attho. ^b^Mehanassā^eb^ti guyhappadesassa. ^b^Khassā^eb^ti okāsassa.

^b^Saha^eb^^a^V1.0055^ea^^b^devehī^eb^tiādīsu saha devehi vattatīti ^b^sadevako^eb^ loko. ^b^Taṃ sadevaka^eb^ntiādinā yojanā veditabbā. ^b^Sadevakavacanenā^eb^ti sadevaka-sadde visesanabhāvena ṭhitadevavacanena. Tassāpi sadevakapade antobhūtattā avayave samudāyopacāravasena vohāro kato. Itarathā tena devavisiṭṭhalokasseva gahaṇato pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ na siyā, evaṃ uparipi. ^b^Samārakavacanena^eb^ mārasaddena tena sahacaritā sabbe vasavattidevā ca gahitāti āha ‘‘chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇa’’nti. Brahmakāyikā nāma paṭhamajjhānabhūmikā. Te ādi yesaṃ āruppapariyantānaṃ brahmānaṃ tesaṃ brahmānaṃ gahaṇaṃ ^b^brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ^eb^. Loka-saddassa okāsalokādīnampi sādhāraṇattā sattalokāveṇikameva pajāgahaṇaṃ katanti āha ‘‘pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa’’nti. Sadevakādivacanena upapattidevānaṃ, sassamaṇavacanena visuddhidevānañca gahitattā āha ‘‘sadevamanussavacanena sammutidevaavasesamanussaggahaṇa’’nti. Tattha ^b^sammutidevā^eb^ rājāno, ^b^avasesamanussā^eb^ sammutidevasamaṇabrāhmaṇehi avasiṭṭhā. Sattalokāveṇikassa pajāsaddassa visuṃ gahitattā sadevakaṃ lokanti ettha lokasaddaggahaṇaṃ okāsalokameva niyametīti āha ‘‘tīhi padehi okāsaloko’’ti. Idañca sadevakādipadattayavacanīyassa padhānatthassa vasena vuttaṃ. Okāsalokavisesanassa panettha devamārādisattalokassāpi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ ^a^M1.0063^ea^ sāmatthiyato gamyamānattā saputto āgatotiādīsu puttādīnaṃ viya. Imasmiñca naye sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ okāsalokaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ sadevamanussaṃ pajañcāti ^b^ca^eb^-kāraṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ, okāsasattalokānaṃ gahaṇena cettha tadubhayasammutinimittabhūto saṅkhāralokopi tadavinābhāvato gahito evāti daṭṭhabbo. Apare pana ‘‘sadevakantiādīhi pañcahi padehi sattalokova attano avayavabhūtadevādivisesanehi visesetvā gahito, taggahaṇena tadādhāro okāsaloko, tadubhayapaññattivisayo saṅkhāraloko ca gahitā eva hontī’’ti vadanti. Tesañca pajanti idaṃ lokasaddassa visesanaṃ katvā sadevakaṃ pajaṃ lokaṃ…pe… sadevamanussaṃ pajaṃ lokanti yojetabbaṃ.

Arūpāvacaraloko gahito pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi gahitattā. Māraggahaṇena tappadhānā taṃsadisā ca upapattidevā saṅgayhantīti āha ‘‘chakāmāvacaradevaloko’’ti. Khattiyaparisā brāhmaṇagahapatisamaṇacātumahārājikatāvatiṃsamārabrahmaparisāti imāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu cātumahārājikādīnaṃ catunnaṃ parisānaṃ sadevakādipadehi saṅgahitattā idha sassamaṇabrāhmaṇinti iminā samaṇaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā ca, sadevamanussanti iminā khattiyaparisā gahapatiparisā ca vuttāti āha ‘‘catuparisavasenā’’ti. Tassa manussaloko gahitoti ^a^V1.0056^ea^ iminā sambandho. Tattha ^b^manussaloko^eb^ti manussasamūho, tenāha ‘‘avasesasabbasattaloko vā’’ti.

Vikappantaraṃ dassento āha ‘‘sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko’’ti. Devapadena sammutidevā, samaṇabrāhmaṇamanussapadehi sesamanussā ca gahitāti evaṃ vikappadvayepi manussaṃ pajaṃ manussiṃ pajanti pajā-saddaṃ manussa-saddena visesetvā taṃ puna saha devehi vattatīti sadevā, pajā. Sadevā ca sā manussā cāti sadevamanussā, taṃ sadevamanussaṃ pajaṃ. Puna kiṃ bhūtaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇinti evaṃ yathā pajāsaddena manussānaññeva gahaṇaṃ siyā, tathā nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ, itarathā manussānaññeva gahaṇaṃ na sampajjati sabbamanussānaṃ visesanabhāvena gahitattā aññapadatthabhūtassa kassaci manussassa abhāvā. Idāni pajanti iminā ^a^M1.0064^ea^ avasesanāgādisattepi saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha ‘‘avasesasabbasattaloko vā’’ti. Etthāpi catuparisavasena avasesasabbasattaloko sammutidevamanussehi vā saha avasesasabbasattalokoti yojetabbaṃ.

Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni ekekapadena abhāgaso sabbalokānaṃ gahaṇapakkhepi tassa tassa visesanassa sapphalataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^api cetthā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhānaṃ devagatipariyāpannānaṃ paricchinnavasena jānanavasena kittisaddo sayaṃ attano avayavabhūtena sadevakavacanena taṃ suṇantānaṃ sāvento abbhuggatoti yojanā. ^b^Anusandhikkamo^eb^ti atthānañceva padānañca anusandhānakkamo, jānanakkamoti attho.

Abhiññāti ya-kāralopena niddesoti āha ‘‘abhiññāyā’’ti. ^b^Samantabhadrakattā^eb^ti sabbabhāgehi sundarattā. ^b^Sāsanadhammo^eb^ti paṭipattipaṭivedhasāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo. ^b^Buddhasubodhitatāyā^eb^ti idaṃ tikaṃ dhammassa hetusarūpaphalavasena vuttaṃ, tathā nāthapabhavattikampi. Majjhe tikadvayaṃ phalavaseneva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Kiccasuddhiyā^eb^ti dhammaṃ sutvā yathāsutavasena paṭipajjantānaṃ suppaṭipattisaṅkhātakiccasuddhiyā.

Idāni ādikalyāṇādippakārameva dhammaṃ desento bhagavā sotūnaṃ yaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, tappakāsakassa brahmacariyapadassa ^b^sāttha^eb^ntiādīni padāni visesanabhāvena vuttāni, na dhammapadassāti dassanamukhena nānappakārato atthaṃ vivaritukāmo ^b^sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu panā^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha tisso sikkhā sakalo ca tantidhammo ^b^sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0057^ea^ nāma. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento sīlādike viya tappakāsakaṃ tantidhammampi pakāseti eva saddatthasamudāyattā pariyattidhammassa. ^b^Yathānurūpa^eb^nti yathārahaṃ. Sikkhattayasaṅgahitañhi sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca atthasampattiyā sampannatthatāya, uparūpari adhigantabbavisesasaṅkhātaatthasampattiyā ca saha atthena payojanena vattatīti sātthameva, na tu sabyañjanaṃ, tantidhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ yathāvuttena atthena sātthaṃ sabyañjanañca. Kirātādimilakkhavacanānampi sātthasabyañjanatte samānepi visiṭṭhatthabyañjanayogaṃ sandhāya sahattho ^a^M1.0065^ea^ devadatto savittotiādi viya ‘‘sātthaṃ sabyañjana’’nti vuttanti āha ‘‘atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjana’’nti. Tattha yaṃ atthaṃ sutvā tathā paṭipajjantā sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti, tassa tādisasampatti ^b^atthasampatti^eb^ nāma, sampannatthatāti attho. ^b^Byañjanasampatti^eb^ nāma sithiladhanitādibyañjanaparipuṇṇāya māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā gambhīrampi atthaṃ uttānaṃ katvā dassanasamatthatā sampannabyañjanatāti attho.

Idāni ^b^nettippakaraṇanayenā^eb^pi (netti 4 dvādasapada) atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^saṅkāsanā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato kāsīyati dīpīyatīti ^b^saṅkāsana^eb^nti kammasādhanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo, evaṃ sesesupi. Paṭhamaṃ kāsanaṃ ^b^pakāsanaṃ^eb^. Ubhayampetaṃ uddesatthavacanasaṅkhātassa vitthāravacanaṃ. Sakiṃ vuttassa puna vacanañca ^b^vivaraṇavibhajanāni^eb^. Ubhayampetaṃ niddesatthavacanaṃ. Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ ^b^uttānīkaraṇapaññattiyo^eb^. Ubhayampetaṃ paṭiniddesatthavacanasaṅkhātassa vitthāravacanaṃ. ^b^Atthapadasamāyogato^eb^ti yathāvuttāni eva cha padāni pariyattiyā atthavibhāgattā atthapadāni, tehi sahitatāya atthakoṭṭhāsayuttattāti attho. Apariyosite pade ādimajjhagatavaṇṇo ^b^akkharaṃ,^eb^ ekakkharaṃ, padaṃ vā akkharaṃ. Vibhattiyantaṃ ^b^padaṃ^eb^. Padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjetīti ^b^byañjanaṃ,^eb^ vākyaṃ. Kathitassevatthassa anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṃ ^b^ākāro^eb^ nāma. Ākārābhihitassa nibbacanaṃ ^b^nirutti^eb^. Nibbacanatthavitthāro ^b^niddeso^eb^. Atha vā ‘‘akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti, niddesehi paññapetī’’ti vacanato saṅkāsanapakāsanasaṅkhaātauddesatthavācakāni vacanāni akkharapadāni nāma. Vivaraṇavibhajanasaṅkhātaniddesatthavācakāni vacanāni byañjanākārā nāma. Uttānīkaraṇapaññattisaṅkhātapaṭiniddesatthavācakāni vacanāni niruttiniddesā nāma, tesaṃ sampattiyā sabyañjananti attho.

^b^Atthagambhīratā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^attho^eb^ nāma tantiattho, hetuphalaṃ vā. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ nāma tanti, hetu vā. ^b^Desanā^eb^ nāma yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpo. ^b^Paṭivedho^eb^ nāma yathāvuttaatthādīnaṃ aviparītāvabodho. Te ^a^V1.0058^ea^ panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā ^b^gambhīrā^eb^. Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā ^a^M1.0066^ea^ atthasabhāgattā ca vuttaṃ ‘‘atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha’’nti. Dhammadesanānaṃ atthasannissitattepi sayaṃ byañjanarūpattā vuttaṃ ‘‘dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana’’nti. Yathāvuttaatthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni ^b^atthapaṭisambhidā^eb^dayo. Tattha ^b^niruttī^eb^ti tantipadānaṃ niddhāretvā vacanaṃ, nibbacananti attho. Tīsu paṭisambhidāsu ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā^eb^. Lokiyā saddheyyavacanamukheneva atthesu pasīdanti, na atthamukhenāti āha ^b^saddheyyato^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kevala^eb^saddo sakalādhivacananti āha ‘‘sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvenā’’ti. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^-saddo idha sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ dīpetīti āha ^b^sikkhattayapariggahitattā^eb^tiādi.

Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ aparenāpi pariyāyena dassetuṃ ^b^api cā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sanidāna^eb^nti desakālādidīpakena nidānavacanena sanidānaṃ. ^b^Sauppattika^eb^nti aṭṭhuppattiādiyuttiyuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷiyojanākkamo – ‘‘verañjo brāhmaṇo samaṇo khalu bho…pe… viharatī’’ti ca, ‘‘taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ ‘itipi so…pe… pavedetī’ti evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato’’ti ca, ‘‘so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, desento ca sātthasabyañjanādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī’’ti ca, ‘‘sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī’’ti ca assosi, sutvā ca atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.

Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kiñcāpi ‘‘dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā atha kho verañjo…pe… upasaṅkamī’’ti evaṃ sādhu kho panātiādipāṭhassa brāhmaṇassa parivitakkanabhāvena vuttattā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti padānantarameva assosīti padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ viya paññāyati, tathāpi ‘‘sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ yathāvuttanidassanatthena iti-saddena paricchinditvā vuttattā pana aññattha iti-saddassa adassanato ca atha kho verañjotiādinā kattabbantaradassanamukhena pāḷiyā pakārantare pavattito ca yathāvuttavaseneva ‘‘sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī’’ti vacanānantarameva assosīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhanaṃ yuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyena hi brāhmaṇassa attanā sutavaseneva ajjhāsayo uppajjatīti ^a^M1.0067^ea^ upasaṅkamanahetudassanamukhena ^b^dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā^eb^tiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.

2.^b^Sītodakaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0059^ea^^b^viya uṇhodakenā^eb^ti idaṃ ukkamena mukhāruḷhavasena vuttaṃ, anupasantasabhāvatāya brāhmaṇasseva uṇhodakaṃ viya sītodakenāti attho gahetabbo, ñāṇatejayuttatāya vā bhagavā uṇhodakopamoti katvā tabbirahitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sītodakaṃ viya katvā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Ekībhāva^eb^nti sammodanakiriyāya ekarūpataṃ. ^b^Yāyā^eb^tiādīsu yāya kathāya sammodi brāhmaṇo, taṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathanti yojanā. Tattha ^b^khamanīya^eb^nti dukkhabahulaṃ idaṃ sarīraṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. ^b^Yāpanīya^eb^nti cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Rogābhāvena ^b^appābādhaṃ^eb^. Dukkhajīvitābhāvena ^b^appātaṅkaṃ^eb^. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇatthāya lahuṃ akicchena uṭṭhātuṃ yoggatāya ^b^lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Bala^eb^nti sarīrassa sabbakiccakkhamaṃ balaṃ kacci atthīti pucchati. ^b^Phāsuvihāro^eb^ti sukhavihāro. Saraṇīyameva dīghaṃ katvā ‘‘sāraṇīya’’nti vuttanti āha ‘‘saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīya’’nti. ^b^Pariyāyehī^eb^ti kāraṇehi.

Bhāvoti kiriyā, tasmiṃ vattamāno napuṃsaka-saddo ^b^bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso^eb^ nāma, kiriyāvisesanasaddoti attho. Ekamante ekasmiṃ ante yuttappadeseti attho. ^b^Khaṇḍiccādibhāva^eb^nti khaṇḍitadantapalitakesādibhāvaṃ. ^b^Rājaparivaṭṭe^eb^ti rājūnaṃ parivattanaṃ, paṭipāṭiyoti attho. Purātanuccakulappasutatāya jiṇṇatā, na vayasāti āha ‘‘cirakālappavattakulanvaye’’ti. Vibhavānaṃ mahantattaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahallakoti āha ‘‘vibhavamahattatāya samannāgate’’ti. ^b^Vibhāvane nāma atthe^eb^ti pakativibhāvanasaṅkhāte atthe. Na abhivādeti vāti abhivādetabbanti na sallakkheti, evaṃ asallakkhaṇapakatikoti vuttaṃ hoti. Rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti etthāpi niccapakatikaṃ aniccapakatikaṃ vāti attho. ^b^Aniccaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇattho.

^b^Sampatijāto^eb^ti muhuttajāto, jātasamanantaramevāti attho. ^b^Sattapadavītihārena gantvā…pe… olokesī^eb^ti ettha dvāraṃ pidhāya nikkhantotiādīsu viya gamanato pure katampi olokanaṃ pacchā kataṃ ^a^M1.0068^ea^ viya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Olokesi^eb^nti ca lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte maṃsacakkhunā volokesīti attho. ^b^Seṭṭho^eb^ti pasatthataro. ^b^Patimānesī^eb^ti pūjesi. ^b^Āsabhi^eb^nti uttamaṃ.

3.^b^Taṃ vacana^eb^nti nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇātiādivacanaṃ. ^b^Aññāya saṇṭhaheyyā^eb^ti arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya. ^b^Jātivasenā^eb^ti khattiyādijātivasena. ^b^Upapattivasenā^eb^ti devesu upapattivasena. ^b^Āviñchantī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0060^ea^ ākaḍḍhanti. Yassa abhivādādikaraṇasaṅkhātassa sāmaggirasassa bhagavati abhāvaṃ maññamāno brāhmaṇo ‘‘arasarūpo’’ti āha, tabbidhurassa rūpataṇhādikasseva sāmaggirasassa abhāvena bhagavā ‘‘arasarūpo’’ti dassetuṃ sāmaggirasasaddassa rūparasādīsu vattanappakāraṃ dassento āha ^b^vatthārammaṇādī^eb^tiādi.

^b^Tālāvatthukatā^eb^ti ucchinnamūlānaṃ tālānaṃ vatthu viya nesaṃ rūparasādīnaṃ vatthu cittasantānaṃ katanti imasmiṃ atthe majjhepadalopaṃ dīghañca katvā niddesoti āha ^b^tālavatthu viyā^eb^tiādi. Tālavatthu viya yesaṃ vatthu kataṃ te tālāvatthukatāti visesanassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo, katatālavatthukāti attho. Matthakacchinnatāloyeva pattaphalādīnaṃ akāraṇatāya avatthūti tālāvatthu, taṃ viya yesaṃ vatthu kataṃ te rūparasādayo tālāvatthukatā, ayaṃ aññapadatthavasena atthaggāho heṭṭhā vuttanayena sugamoti visesamatthaṃ dassento āha ‘‘matthakacchinnatālo viya katā’’ti. Evañca matthakasadisesu rūparasādīsu rāgesu chinnesupi tabbatthubhūtassa tālāvatthusadisassa cittasantānassa yāva parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ upapannameva hoti. Yathārutato pana visesanasamāsavasena atthe gayhamāne rūparasādīnaṃ tālāvatthusadisatāya ṭhānaṃ āpajjati. Yaṃ pana ^b^sāratthadīpaniyaṃ^eb^ (sārattha. ṭī. 1.3) etaṃ dosaṃ pariharituṃ rūparasādīnaṃ kusalākusalattaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ te tathāgatassa pahīnātiādipāḷiyā, kāmasukhassādasaṅkhātā rūparasātiādiaṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti, khīṇāsavānampi yāva parinibbānā kusalākusalānaṃ phaluppattito tesaṃ matthakacchinnatālasadisatāpi na yuttāti gahetabbaṃ. Atha vā matthakacchinnatālassa ṭhitaṃ aṭṭhitañca amanasikatvā puna anuppattidhammatāsadisamattaṃ upametvā tālāvatthu viya katāti visesanasamāsavasena ^a^M1.0069^ea^ atthaggahaṇepi na koci doso. ^b^Anu^eb^-saddo pacchāti atthe vattatīti āha ^b^pacchābhāvo na hotī^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anu abhāvaṃ gatā^eb^ti pacchā anuppattidhammatāvasena abhāvaṃ gatā. ^b^Anacchariyā^eb^ti anu anu uparūpari vimhayakatāti attho. ^b^Yañca kho tvaṃ vadesī^eb^ti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggīrasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi, taṃ kāraṇaṃ na vijjatīti attho.
4.^b^Sandhāya bhāsitamattha^eb^nti yaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha, bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti, taṃ sandhāya bhāsitamatthaṃ.
5.^b^Kulasamudācārakamma^eb^nti ^a^V1.0061^ea^ kulācārakammaṃ. Kāyato kāyadvārato pavattaṃ duccaritaṃ ^b^kāyaduccaritaṃ. Anekavihitā^eb^ti anekappakārā.

6.^b^Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassā^eb^ti rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu ativiya saṅgavasena niyuttassa kāmarāgassa, etena anāgāmīnaṃ vatthābharaṇādīsu saṅganikantivasena uppajjanakāmarāgassa kāmarāgatābhāvaṃ dasseti tassa rūparāgādīsu saṅgahato. ^b^Avasesāna^eb^nti ettha sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ paṭhamena maggena, sesānaṃ catūhipi ucchedaṃ vadati, tenāha ‘‘yathānurūpa’’nti.
7.^b^Jigucchati maññe^eb^ti jigucchati viya, ‘‘jigucchatī’’ti vā sallakkhemi. ^b^Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhenā^eb^ti aññāṇasambhūtaṭṭhena.

8-10.^b^Tatrā^eb^ti yathāvuttesu dvīsu atthavikappesu. Paṭisandhipariyāyopi idha gabbhasaddoti āha ‘‘devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāyā’’ti. ^b^Apunabbhavabhūtā^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.

11.^b^Dhammadhātu^eb^nti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tañhi dhamme yāthāvato dhāreti upadhāretīti ‘‘dhammadhātū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Desanāvilāsappatto^eb^ti abhirucivasena parivattetvā desetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso, taṃ patto. ^b^Karuṇāvipphāra^eb^nti sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya pharaṇaṃ. Tādiguṇalakkhaṇameva upamāya vibhāvento āha ‘‘pathavīsamacittata’’nti. Tatoyeva ^a^M1.0070^ea^ akujjhanasabhāvato ^b^akuppadhammatā. Jātiyā anugata^eb^nti jātiyā anubaddhaṃ. ^b^Jarāya anusaṭa^eb^nti jarāya paliveṭhitaṃ. ^b^Vaṭṭakhāṇubhūta^eb^nti vaṭṭato uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya vaṭṭe niccalabhāvena ṭhitaṃ khāṇu viya bhūtaṃ. Jātānaṃ maccānaṃ niccaṃ maraṇato bhayanti āha ^b^ajja maritvā^eb^tiādi. ^b^Appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāva^eb^nti asadisaṃ ariyāya jātiyā paṭhamajātabhāvaṃ, sabbajeṭṭhabhāvanti attho.

‘‘Apī’’ti avatvā ‘‘pī’’ti vadanto ^b^pi^eb^-saddo visuṃ atthi nipātoti dasseti. ^b^Sammā adhisayitānī^eb^ti pādādīhi upaghātaṃ akarontiyā sammadeva upari sayitāni, akammakassāpi sayatidhātuno adhipubbatāya sakammakatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Nakhasikhā^eb^ti nakhaggāni. Sakuṇānaṃ ^a^V1.0062^ea^ pakkhā hatthapādaṭṭhāniyāti āha ‘‘saṅkuṭitahatthapādā’’ti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ālokaṭṭhāne. ^b^Nikkhamantāna^eb^nti nikkhamantesu, niddhāraṇe hetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Aṇḍakosa^eb^nti aṇḍakapālaṃ.

Lokoyeva ^b^lokasannivāso^eb^. Abujjhi etthāti rukkho ^b^bodhi,^eb^ sayaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti vā tenāti maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi bodhi. Bujjhīyatīti nibbānaṃ bodhi. ^b^Antarā ca bodhi^eb^nti dutiyamudāharaṇaṃ vināpi rukkha-saddena bodhi-saddassa rukkhappavattidassanatthaṃ. ^b^Varabhūrimedhaso^eb^ti mahāpathavī viya patthaṭapaññoti attho. ^b^Tisso vijjā^eb^ti arahattamaggo attanā saha vattamānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇañceva itarā dve mahaggatavijjā ca tabbinibandhakakilesaviddhaṃsanavasena uppādanato ‘‘tisso vijjā’’ti vuccati. ^b^Cha abhiññā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sāvakapāramīñāṇa^eb^nti aggasāvakehi paṭilabhitabbaṃ sabbameva lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. ^b^Paccekabodhiñāṇa^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo.

^b^Opammasampaṭipādana^eb^nti opammatthassa upameyyena samaṃ paṭipādanaṃ. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti upameyyatthena. ^b^Tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvo^eb^ti iminā saṅkhārupekkhāpattataṃ vipassanāya dasseti. ^b^Pariṇāmakālo^eb^ti iminā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvāpattiṃ. Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha ‘‘gabbhaggahaṇakālo’’ti. ^b^Anupubbādhigatenā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggādipaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena. ^b^Caturaṅgasamannāgata^eb^nti ‘‘kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu ^a^M1.0071^ea^ (ma. ni. 2.184; saṃ. ni. 2.22; a. ni. 2.5; mahāni. 196), sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita’’nti evaṃ vuttacaturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ.

^b^Chando kāmo^eb^tiādīsu patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho icchanaṭṭhena ^b^chando^eb^. Tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo^eb^. Tatopi balavataro ^b^chandarāgo^eb^. Nimittānubyañjanasaṅkappavasena pavatto ^b^saṅkappo^eb^. Tatopi balavasaṅkappavaseneva pavatto ^b^rāgo^eb^. Tatopi balavataro ^b^saṅkapparāgo^eb^. Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākārabhedena avatthābhedena ca vutto.

^b^Seyyathida^eb^nti taṃ kathanti attho. ^b^Eta^eb^nti pubbapadeyeva avadhāraṇakaraṇaṃ, etaṃ atthajātaṃ vā. ^b^Tannissaraṇato^eb^ti tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇattā. ^b^Esā^eb^ti eva-kāro. Kāmadhātu nāma kāmabhavo, ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānaṃ. ^b^Esā^eb^ti niyamo. Tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇavivekā ^a^V1.0063^ea^^b^tadaṅgavivekādayo^eb^. Kāyacittaupadhivivekā ^b^kāyavivekādayo, tayo eva idha^eb^ jhānakathāya, samucchedavivekādīnaṃ asambhavā. ^b^Niddese^eb^ti mahāniddese. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti mahāniddese eva. ^b^Vibhaṅge^eb^ti jhānavibhaṅge. ^b^Evañhi satī^eb^ti ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati.

^b^Purimenā^eb^ti kāyavivekena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ kāyacittavivekadvaye. ^b^Dutiyenā^eb^ti cittavivekena. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti yathāvuttanayena vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekadvayassa vācakabhūtānaṃ vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehīti imesaṃ padānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Bālabhāvassa^eb^ hetupariccāgoti anuvattati. Akusaladhammo hi bālabhāvassa hetu. ^b^Āsayaposana^eb^nti āsayassa visodhanaṃ vaḍḍhanañca. Vibhaṅge nīvaraṇāneva vuttānīti sambandho. Tattha kāraṇamāha ‘‘uparijhānaṅgapaccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato’’ti. Tattha upari savitakkantiādinā vuccamānāni jhānaṅgāni, tesaṃ attano paccanīkānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti attho. Uparijhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvassa dassanatotipi pāṭho. Tattha ‘‘upari vuccamānajhānaṅgānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena paṭipakkhabhāvadassanato’’ti ‘‘nīvaraṇānaṃ tāneva vibhaṅge vuttānī’’tipi atthaṃ vadanti ^a^M1.0072^ea^. ^b^Peṭake^eb^ti mahākaccāyanattherena kataṃ nettippakaraṇanayānusāripakaraṇaṃ, taṃ pana piṭakānaṃ vaṇṇanābhūtattā ‘‘peṭaka’’nti vuttaṃ, tasminti attho.

Vitakkanaṃ nāma ārammaṇaparikappananti āha ‘‘ūhana’’nti. Rūpaṃ rūpantiādinā visaye ākoṭentassa visayappavattiāhananaṃ upari āhanananti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ārammaṇe cittassa ānayanaṃ^eb^ nāma ārammaṇābhimukhakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Anusañcaraṇa^eb^nti anuparibbhamanaṃ, tañca khaṇantarassa tathākārena uppādanameva, na hi paramatthato ekassa sañcaraṇamatthi, evamaññatthāpi īdisesu. ^b^Anumajjana^eb^nti parimajjanaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ārammaṇe. ^b^Sahajātānuyojanaṃ^eb^ sakiccānuvattitākaraṇena. ^b^Katthacī^eb^ti dutiyajjhānavirahitesu savicāracittesu sabbatthāti attho. Vicārena saha uppajjamānopi vitakko ārammaṇe abhiniropanākārena pavattiṃ sandhāya ‘‘paṭhamābhinipāto’’ti vutto. ^b^Vipphāravā^eb^ti avūpasantasabhāvatāya vegavā, tenevesa dutiyajjhāne pahānaṅgaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^Paṭhamadutiyajjhānesū^eb^ti pañcakanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aṅgavinimuttassa jhānassa abhāvaṃ dassento ^b^rukkho viyā^eb^tiādimāha.

Viveka-saddassa bhāvasādhanapakkhe ‘‘tasmā vivekā’’ti vuttaṃ, itarapakkhe ‘‘tasmiṃ viveke’’ti. ^b^Pinayatī^eb^ti tappeti, vaḍḍheti vā. ^b^Pharaṇarasā^eb^ti paṇītarūpehi kāye byāpanarasā. ^b^Sātalakkhaṇa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0064^ea^ iṭṭhasabhāvaṃ, madhuranti attho. Sampayuttānaṃ pīḷanajjhupekkhanaṃ akatvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ upakāritā vā ^b^anuggaho^eb^. Vanameva ^b^vanantaṃ^eb^. Udakameva ^b^udakantaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato^eb^ti iminā iṭṭhārammaṇādipaṭilābhasamayepi sukhaṃ vijjamānampi apākaṭaṃ, pītiyeva tattha pākaṭā, paṭiladdharasānubhavanasamaye ca vijjamānapītitopi sukhameva pākaṭataranti dasseti. Ettha ca cetasikasukhavaseneva paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ, na kāyikasukhavasena tassa pītisampayogasseva abhāvena idhānadhippetattā. ^b^Ayañca pītī^eb^tiādi aññapadatthasamaāsadassanaṃ, assatthipakkhe taddhitapaccayadassanaṃ vā. Dutiyavikappena aññapadatthasamāsavaseneva ‘‘vivekajaṃ pītisukha’’nti idaṃ ekaṃ padanti dasseti, vibhattiyā ca alopaṃ.

^b^Gaṇanānupubbatā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0073^ea^ desanākkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatī^eb^ti idaṃ ādikammikavasena vuttaṃ, ciṇṇavasīnaṃ pana yogīnaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi jhānaṃ uppajjateva. ^b^Jhāpetī^eb^ti dahati. Aniccādilakkhaṇavisayāya vipassanāya upanijjhāyanaṃ kathaṃ nibbānālambanassa maggassa hotīti āha ^b^vipassanāyā^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^maggena sijjhatī^eb^ti niccādivipallāsappahāyakena saha maggeneva taṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ asammohato attano sijjhati. Atha vā maggenāti maggakiccena, vipallāsappahānenāti attho.
^b^Añño^eb^ti satto. ^b^Avuttattā^eb^ti ‘‘sacittekaggata’’nti ^b^jhānapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (vibha. 508 ādayo) avuttattā. ^b^Vuttattā^eb^ti tassā jhānapāḷiyā ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ vuttattā.

Ajjhattanti jhānavisesanattā vuttaṃ ‘‘idha niyakajjhattamadhippeta’’nti. Jhānañhi ajjhattajjhattaṃ na hoti chaḷindriyānameva tabbhāvato. Khuddakā ūmiyo ^b^vīciyo^eb^. Mahatiyo ^b^taraṅgā. Santā honti samitā^eb^tiādīni aññamaññavevacanāni, jhānabalena samatikkantāti adhippāyo. ^b^Appitā^eb^ti gamitā vināsaṃ pāpitā. ^b^Pariyāyo^eb^ti jhānaparikkhāre jhānavohārattā aparamatthato.

^b^Tadadhigamāyā^eb^ti tatiyamaggādhigamāya. ^b^Upapattito ikkhatī^eb^ti paññāya sahacaraṇaparicayena yathā ^a^V1.0065^ea^ samavāhibhāvo hoti, evaṃ yuttito passati. ^b^Vipulāyā^eb^ti mahaggatabhāvappattāya. ^b^Thāmagatāyā^eb^ti vitakkavicārapītivigamena thirabhāvappattiyā, teneva vakkhati ‘‘vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā’’tiādi. (Pārā. aṭṭha. 1.11 tatiyajjhānakathā). Upekkhābhedaṃ dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ upekkhaṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^upekkhā panā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatramajjhattatāva khīṇāsavānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanākārena ajjhupekkhanato ‘‘chaḷaṅgupekkhā’’ti ca, sattesu majjhattākārappavattattā ‘‘brahmavihārupekkhā’’ti ca, sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā ‘‘bojjhaṅgupekkhā’’ti ca, kevalā ‘‘tatramajjhattupekkhā’’ti ^a^M1.0074^ea^ ca, tatiyajjhānasahagatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātabhūtā ‘‘jhānupekkhā’’ti ca, catutthajjhānasahagatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhitāya ‘‘pārisuddhupekkhā’’ti ca tena tena avatthābhedena chadhā vuttā.

Vīriyameva pana anaccāraddhaanatisithilesu sahajātesu saṅkhāresu upekkhanākārena pavattaṃ ‘‘vīriyupekkhā’’ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannaṃ rūpārūpajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhato pubbabhāge eva nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṃ pahānābhimukhībhūtattā tesaṃ pahānepi abyāpārabhāvūpagamanena majjhattākārappavattā samādhivasena uppannā aṭṭha paññā ceva upādānakkhandhabhūtesu saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhanākārappavattā vipassanāvasena uppannā catunnaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge tassa tassa adhigamāya catasso catunnaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ pubbabhāge tassa tassa adhigamāya appaṇihitavimokkhavasena pavattā catasso suññataanimittavimokkhavasena dveti dasa paññā cāti ime aṭṭhārasa paññā ^b^saṅkhārupekkhā^eb^ nāma. Yathāvuttavipassanāpaññāva lakkhaṇavicinanepi majjhattabhūtā ^b^vipassanupekkhā^eb^ nāma. Adukkhamasukhavedanā ^b^vedanupekkhā^eb^ nāma. Imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ ‘‘tattha tattha āgatanayato vibhāgo ^b^dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena veditabbo’’ti dassento āha ^b^evamayaṃ dasavidhāpī^eb^tiādi. Tattha tattha āgatanayatoti idampi hi tāsaṃ vibhāgadassanassa bhūmipuggalādipadaṃ viya visuṃ mātikāpadavasena vuttaṃ, na pana bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgadassanassa āgataṭṭhānaparāmasanaṃ āgataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhasāliniyātiādinā vuttattā, tasmā ^b^sāratthadīpaniyaṃ^eb^ (sārattha. ṭī. 1.11 tatiyajjhānakathā) yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgo tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti dassento āha evamayaṃ dasavidhātiādī’’ti, taṃ amanasikatvā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Tattha tattha āgatanayato^eb^ti ‘‘idha (khīṇāsavo) bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti, na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 3.348; a. ni. 6.1) chaḷaṅgupekkhā āgatā, ‘‘upekkhāsahagatena ^a^V1.0066^ea^ cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.308; ma. ni. 1.77; 2.309; 3.230) evaṃ brahmavihārupekkhā āgatāti iminā nayena ^a^M1.0075^ea^ dasannampi upekkhānaṃ tattha tattha vuttapadesesu āgatanayadassanato ca ayaṃ dasavidhāpi upekkhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti sambandho.

^b^Bhūmī^eb^tiādīsu pana chaḷaṅgupekkhā kāmāvacarā, brahmavihārupekkhā rūpāvacarātiādinā ^b^bhūmito^eb^ ca, chaḷaṅgupekkhā asekkhānameva, brahmavihārupekkhā puthujjanādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi puggalānantiādinā ^b^puggalato^eb^ ca, chaḷaṅgupekkhā somanassupekkhāsahagatacittasampayuttātiādinā ^b^cittato^eb^ ca, chaḷaṅgupekkhā chaḷārammaṇātiādinā ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ ca, ‘‘vedanupekkhā vedanākkhandhena saṅgahitā, itarā nava saṅkhārakkhandhenā’’ti ^b^khandhasaṅgahavasena^eb^ ca, ‘‘chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārabojjhaṅgajhāna pārisuddhitatramajjhattupekkhā ca atthato ekā. Tasmā ekakkhaṇe ca tāsu ekāya sati itarā na uppajjanti, tathā saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanupekkhāpi veditabbā. Vedanāvīriyupekkhānamekakkhaṇe siyā uppattī’’ti ^b^ekakkhaṇavasena^eb^ ca, ‘‘chaḷaṅgupekkhā abyākatā brahmavihārupekkhā kusalābyākatā, tathā sesā. Vedanupekkhā pana siyā akusalāpī’’ti evaṃ ^b^kusalattikavasena^eb^ ca, ‘‘saṅkhepato cattāro ca dhammā vīriyavedanātatramajjhattatāñāṇavasenā’’ti evaṃ ^b^saṅkhepavasena^eb^ ca ayaṃ dasavidhāpi upekkhā ^b^dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti yojanā.

Ettha cetā kiñcāpi ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ bhūmipuggalādivasena sarūpato uddharitvā na vuttā, tathāpi tattha vuttappakāreheva tāsaṃ bhūmipuggalādivibhāgo nayato uddharitvā sakkā ñātunti tattha sarūpato vuttañca avuttañca ekato saṅgahetvā tattha tattha āgatanayatotiādīhi navahi pakārehi atideso kato, teneva ‘‘dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavasenā’’ti avatvā ^b^‘‘vuttanayenevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathāhi khīṇāsavo bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti ādimhi vutte chaḷaṅgupekkhā rūpādiārammaṇatāya bhūmito kāmāvacarā ca puggalato asekkhānameva ca uppajjati, cittato somanassupekkhācittasampayuttā, ārammaṇato chaḷārammaṇā, kusalattikato abyākatā cāti paṇḍitehi sakkā ^a^M1.0076^ea^ ñātuṃ, tathā chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekātiādimhi vutte panassa saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitattā brahmavihārupekkhādīhi saha ekakkhaṇe anuppattiādayo ca sakkā ñātuṃ, yathā ca chaḷaṅgupekkhā, evaṃ sesānampi yathārahaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttanayato bhūmiādivibhāguddhāranayo ^a^V1.0067^ea^ ñātabbo. ^b^Anābhogarasā^eb^ti paṇītasukhepi tasmiṃ avanatipaṭipakkhakiccāti attho.

^b^Puggalenā^eb^ti puggalādhiṭṭhānena. Kilesehi sampayuttānaṃ ^b^ārakkhā. Tīraṇaṃ^eb^ kiccassa pāragamanaṃ. ^b^Pavicayo^eb^ vīmaṃsā. ^b^Ida^eb^nti satisampajaññaṃ. Yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhanti imassa tasmā etamatthantiādinā sambandho. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti jhānasamaṅgino. ^b^Taṃsamuṭṭhānenā^eb^ti taṃ yathāvuttanāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yassa rūpassa tena taṃsamuṭṭhānena rūpena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^Yassā^eb^ti rūpakāyassa. ^b^Phuṭattā^eb^ti atipaṇītena rūpena phuṭattā. ^b^Etamatthaṃ dassento^eb^ti kāyikasukhahetubhūtarūpasamuṭṭhāpakanāmakāyasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno eva jhānasamaṅgitākaraṇe kāriyopacārato ‘‘sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī’’ti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dassentoti attho. ^b^Ya^eb^nti hetuatthe nipātoti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃjhānahetū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sukhapāramippatte^eb^ti sukhassa ukkaṃsapariyantaṃ patte. Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbanti sambandho. Atha kasmā jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti sambandho.

^b^Kattha cuppanna^eb^nti ettha ^b^katthā^eb^ti hetumhi bhummaṃ, kasmiṃ hetumhi satīti attho. ^b^Nānāvajjane^eb^ti appanāvīthiāvajjanato nānā bhinnaṃ purimavīthīsu āvajjanaṃ yassa upacārassa, tasmiṃ nānāvajjane. Visamanisajjāya uppannakilamatho visamāsanupatāpo. ^b^Upacāre vā^eb^tiādi pakkhantaradassanaṃ ekāvajjanūpacārepi vāti attho. ^b^Pītipharaṇenā^eb^ti iminā appanāvīthiyā viya ekavīthiyampi kāmāvacarapītiyā pharaṇamattassa abhāvaṃ dasseti. Domanassindriyassa assa siyā uppattīti sambandho. ^b^Eta^eb^nti domanassindriyaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. ^b^Vitakkavicārappaccayepī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto. So ‘‘pahīnassā’’ti heṭṭhā vuttapadānantaraṃ yojetabbo ^a^M1.0077^ea^ ‘‘pahīnassāpi domanassindriyassā’’ti. ^b^Vitakkavicārabhāve^eb^ti ettha ‘‘uppajjati domanassindriya’’nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, vitakkavicārabhāvahetūti attho. ^b^Vitakkavicārā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo tasmāti etasmiṃ atthe daṭṭhabbo, tena yasmā etaṃ domanassindriyaṃ vitakkavicārapaccaye…pe… neva uppajjati, yattha pana uppajjati, tattha vitakkavicārabhāveyeva uppajjati. Yasmā ca appahīnāyeva dutiyajjhānūpacāre vitakkavicārā, tasmā tatthassa siyā uppattīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.

^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0068^ea^ dutiyajjhānūpacāre. ^b^Assā^eb^ti domanassindriyassa. ^b^Siyā uppattī^eb^ti idañca paccayamattadassanena sambhāvanamattato vuttaṃ. Domanassuppattisambhāvanāpi hi upacārakkhaṇeyeva kātuṃ yuttā, vitakkavicārarahite pana dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe taduppattisambhāvanāpi na yuttā kātunti. Itarathā kusalacittakkhaṇe akusaladomanassuppattiyā asambhavato ‘‘tatthassa siyā uppattī’’ti na vattabbaṃ siyā. Samīpatthe vā etaṃ bhummaṃ, upacārajjhānānantaravīthīsūti attho. ^b^Dutiyajjhāne^eb^ti etthāpi anantaravīthīsupi na tveva uppajjatīti attho, evaṃ upari sukhindriyepi. Somanassindriyassa uppattīti sambandho. ^b^Pahīnāti vuttā^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā’’ti vuttattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Dukkhābhāvenā^eb^ti dukkhatābhāvena. Evaṃ ^b^sukhābhāvenā^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^Etenā^eb^ti dukkhasukhapaṭikkhepavacanena. ^b^Iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti atiiṭṭhaatianiṭṭhānaṃ viparītassa majjhattārammaṇassa anubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattārammaṇampi hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu eva paviṭṭhaṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvā.
Jhānacatukkakathāvaṇṇanānayo niṭṭhito.

12. Arūpajjhānānampi aṅgasamatāya catutthajjhāne saṅgahoti āha ^b^kesañci abhiññāpādakānī^eb^tiādi, teneva vakkhati ‘‘aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā’’tiādi (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.12). Tesu ca catutthajjhānameva abhiññāpādakaṃ nirodhapādakaṃ ^a^M1.0078^ea^ hoti, na itarāni. Dūrakāraṇataṃ pana sandhāya ‘‘cattāri jhānānī’’ti nesampi ekato gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Cittekaggatatthānī^eb^ti idaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha ^b^khīṇāsavāna^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sabbakiccasādhaka^eb^nti dibbavihārādisabbabuddhakiccasādhakaṃ. ^b^Sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyaka^eb^nti iminā yathāvuttaṃ vipassanāpādakattādisabbaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Idañhi jhānaṃ bhagavato sabbabuddhaguṇadāyakassa maggañāṇassa padaṭṭhānattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yathayida^eb^nti yathā idaṃ. ^b^Abhinīhārakkhama^eb^nti iddhividhādiatthaṃ tadabhimukhaṃ nīharaṇayoggaṃ.

^b^Jhānappaṭilābhapaccayāna^eb^nti jhānappaṭilābhahetukānaṃ jhānappaṭilābhaṃ nissāya uppajjanakānaṃ. ^b^Pāpakāna^eb^nti lāmakānaṃ. ^b^Icchāvacarāna^eb^nti icchāya vasena otiṇṇānaṃ nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ tadekaṭṭhatañca appattānaṃ attukkaṃsanādivasappavattānaṃ aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ evarūpaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyātiādinayappavattānaṃ mānādīnaṃ. Potthakesu pana ‘‘jhānappaṭilābhapaccanīkāna’’ntipi ^a^V1.0069^ea^ pāṭhaṃ likhanti, so pamādapāṭhoti gahetabbo ‘‘jhānappaṭilābhapaccanīkānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ abhāvassa nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena parisuddho’’ti evaṃ pubbe parisuddhapadeyeva vuttattā. ^b^Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ^eb^ (sārattha. ṭī. 1.12) pana ‘‘icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti atthoti ayampi pāṭho ayutto evāti gahetabbaṃ. Tato eva ca ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ ayaṃ pāṭho sabbena sabbaṃ na dassito’’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ca nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti evaṃ nīvaraṇabhāvappattadosānaṃ parāmaṭṭhattā ayaṃ pāṭho paṭikkhittoti veditabbo.

^b^Abhijjhādīna^eb^nti ettha abhijjhā-saddena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvasseva lobhassa mānādīnañca gahaṇaṃ jhānappaṭilābhapaccayānanti anuvattamānattā. ^b^Ubhayampī^eb^ti anaṅgaṇattaṃ vigatūpakkilesattañcāti etaṃ ubhayampi yathākkamaṃ ^b^anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttā^eb^nusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Tesu ca suttesu kiñcāpi nīvaraṇasabhāvappattā thūladosāpi vuttā, tathāpi adhigatacatautthajjhānassa vasena vuttattā idha sukhumā eva te gahitā. Aṅgaṇupakkilesasāmaññena panettha suttānaṃ apadisanaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘suttānusārenā’’ti vuttaṃ, na pana suttavasenāti.

Pubbenivāsānussatiyaṃ ^a^M1.0079^ea^ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇanti nibbacanaṃ dassento āha ^b^pubbenivāsānussatimhī^eb^tiādi. Idāni pubbenivāsaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiṃ tattha ñāṇañca vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^tatthā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubba^eb^-saddo atītabhavavisayo, ^b^nivāsa^eb^-saddo ca kammasādhanoti āha ‘‘pubbe atītajātīsu nivutthakkhandhā’’ti. Nivutthatā cettha sakasantāne pavattatā, tenāha ^b^anubhūtā^eb^tiādi. Idāni saparasantānasādhanavasena nivāsa-saddassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā’’ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ ^b^gocaranivāsenā^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
